src: المؤرخين انتقدوا السياسات القديمة لمكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي عشان بيركز موارده على القضايا اللي بيكون تحليلها سهل، وبالذات حالات العربيات المسروقة، وده عشان تعزيز معدل نجاح المكتب. الكونجرس بدأ في تمويل المبادرة بتاعت الفحش في السنة المالية 2005 وقال أن مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي لازم يحدد 10 عمالة للأفلام الإباحية للكبار.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI's old policies for focusing its resources on cases that were easy to analyze, particularly stolen cars, in order to boost the bureau's success rate. Congress began funding the adult film initiative in the 2005 fiscal year and said the FBI must identify 10 cases of child pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: طيارة جاس-39غربين اتحطمت على مدرج الساعة 9:30 الصبح تقريبًا بالتوقيت المحلي (0230 التوقيت العالمي الموحد) وانفجرت، ودا اتسبب أنهم يقفلوا المطار قدام الرحلات الجوية التجارية. تم الإشارة للطيار على أنه قائد السرب ديلوكريت باتافي. وسائل الإعلام المحلية قالت أن فيه عربية مطافي بالمطار اتقلبت خلال عملية.
mt: 9:30 a.m. local time (0230 UTC) a JAS-39 Gripen crashed on the runway, and exploded, causing the airport to be closed to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as squadron leader Danijel Lešić. Local media reported that there was a fire truck at the airport that overturned during the incident.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: في ستينيات القرن الماضي، اشتغل بريجنسكي مستشار لجون إف كينيدي وبعد كده اشتغل في إدارة ليندون جونسون. وخلال اختيارات سنة 1976، كان مستشار كارتر للسياسة الخارجية، وبعد كده مسك منصب مستشار الأمن القومي بعد ما هنري كيسنجر مشى وده كان من 1977 لحد 1981. لما كان شغال في وكالة الأمن القومي، ساعد كارتر في إدارة شؤون الدنيا بطريقة دبلوماسية زي اتفاقيات كامب ديفيد سنة 1978؛ وفكرة تطبيع العلاقات الأمريكية والصينية في أواخر السبعينيات؛ وكمان الثورة الإيرانية اللي كانت سبب أساسي في كارثة الرهائن اللي حصلت في إيران سنة 1979؛ وفي الآخر برده الاحتلال السوفييتي لأفغانستان عام 1979.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later worked in the administration of Lyndon Johnson. During the 1976 presidential election, he was a foreign policy adviser to Jimmy Carter, and later served as Carter's National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981. While working at the National Security Council, he helped Carter manage world affairs in a diplomatic manner, such as the Camp David Accords of 1978; the idea of normalizing American and Chinese relations in the late 1970s; and the Iranian Revolution, which was a major factor in the Iran hostage crisis of 1979; and finally the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: اتولد بوبيك في عاصمة كرواتيا زغرب ،  واتشهر كلاعب بارتيزان بلغراد. انضم ليهم سنة 1945 وبقي معاهم لحد سنة 1958. خلال الفترة اللي قضاها مع الفريق، جاب ٤٠٣ جون في ٤٦٨ ماتش. مفيش أي شخص تاني سجل حضور أو أحرز أهداف للنادي زي بوبيك. اتصوت له في سنة 1995 على أنه أفضل لاعب في تاريخ البارتيزان.
mt: Born in the capital of Croatia, Zagreb, he became a Partizan Belgrade player in 1945 and stayed with them until 1958. During the period he spent with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 matches. No one else has scored or scored as many goals for the club as Bobek. He was voted the best player in the history of Partizan in 1995.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "هيسبرونيقوس إليزابيثي  بيعتبرنوع من فصيلة الدرومايوصوريات وهو قريب لفيلوسيرابتور. بيتظن أن الطائر الجارح ده اللي ليه ريش كامل ودم حار مشي في وضع عمودي على ساقين ليهم مخالب زي الفيلوسيرابتور. المخلب التاني بتاعه كان أكبر، وعشان كده اتسمى الديناصور هيسبيرونيكس اللي معناه ""المخلب الغربي."""
mt: "Hesperornis elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae, and is closely related to Velociraptor. It is believed that this predatory bird with a full coat of feathers and a warm-blooded metabolism walked upright on legs with claws like Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, hence the dinosaur was named Hesperornis, meaning "western claw.""
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: حضر الحفلة دي حوالي 100 شخص عشان يحتفلوا بالذكرى السنوية الأولى لعروسين اتجوزوا السنة اللي فاتت. وقال مسؤولون إنه في احتفال رسمي هيتعمل في الذكرى السنوية في ميعاد تانى. الزوجين كانوا اتجوزوا في تكساس قبل سنة وجم إلى بافالو عشان الاحتفال مع الأصدقاء والأقارب. الزوج اللي عنده 30 سنة اللي اتولد في بافلو، كان واحد من الأربعة اللي اتقتلوا في إطلاق النار، لكن زوجته متصابتش.
mt: 100 people attended the party to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple who married last year. Officials said a formal celebration will be held at a later date. The couple married in Texas last year and moved to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old groom, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: حضر الحفلة دي حوالي 100 شخص عشان يحتفلوا بالذكرى السنوية الأولى لعروسين اتجوزوا السنة اللي فاتت. وقال مسؤولون إنه في احتفال رسمي هيتعمل في الذكرى السنوية في ميعاد تانى. الزوجين كانوا اتجوزوا في تكساس قبل سنة وجم إلى بافالو عشان الاحتفال مع الأصدقاء والأقارب. الزوج اللي عنده 30 سنة اللي اتولد في بافلو، كان واحد من الأربعة اللي اتقتلوا في إطلاق النار، لكن زوجته متصابتش.
mt: 100 people attended the party to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple who married last year. Officials said a formal celebration will be held at a later date. The couple married in Texas last year and moved to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old groom, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: لونو كان عليها من 120 إلى 160 متر مكعّب من الوقود، لما اتحطمت ودفع الرياح الشديدة والأمواج العالية ليها عشان تصد بحائل الأمواج. المروحيات أنقذت أفراد الطاقم اللي عددهم اتناشر وكانت الإصابة الوحيدة أنف مكسور. السفينة اللي طولها 100 متر كانت في طريقها أنها تلتقط حمولتها المعتادة من الأسمدة، وكان المسؤولين خايفين من البداية أن السفينة ممكن تسرب كمية كبيرة.
mt: 120 to 160 cubic meters of fuel were on board when it crashed and strong winds and high waves pushed it into the breakers. Helicopters rescued the crew of 12, with the only injury being a broken nose. The ship, 100 meters long, was on its way to collect its usual load of fertilizer, and officials were initially concerned that a large amount could have leaked.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: إنجازات فوتييه بعيدة عن المسار من ضمنها إضراب عن الطعام سنة 1973 ضد اللي اعتبره رقابة سياسية. القانون الفرنسي اتغير. نشاطه السياسي بدأ من وهو عنده 15 لما انضم للمقاومة الفرنسية أيام الحرب العالمية التانية. سجل نفسه في كتاب يعود لسنة 1998. عاد في الستينيات إلى الجزائر اللي لسة كانت حاصلة على استقلالها عشان يدرس الإخراج السينمائي.
mt: 1. His achievements are off the beaten path, including a hunger strike in 1973 against what he considered political censorship. French law changed. His political activism began at age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He registered himself in a book in 1998. He returned to Algeria, which was still under colonial rule, in the 1960s to study film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: أكتر من أربعة مليون شخص راحوا روما عشان يحضرورا الجنازة. عدد الحاضرين كان كبير لدرجة إنه مكنش ممكن للكل أنهم يوصلوا للجنازة في ساحة القديس بطرس. اتركبت عدد من شاشات التلفزيون الكبيرة في أماكن مختلفة في روما عشان الجمهور يشوف مراسم الجنازة. في عدد كبير من المدن الإيطالية التانية وفي بقية الدنيا، بالذات في بولندا، كان فيه تجهيزات متشابهة حضرها ناس كتير.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral. The number of attendees was so large that not everyone could reach the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were set up in different places in Rome so that the audience could watch the funeral. In many Italian cities and in other parts of the world, especially in Poland, similar arrangements were attended by many people.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: وزي ما جه في التقارير إن الشقّة الموجودة في شارع ماكبيث انفجرت بسبب تسرب غاز. جه مسؤول تابع لشركة الغاز إلى مكان الحادث بعد ما بلغ واحد من الجيران إن الغاز اتسرب. لما وصل المسؤول الشقة انفجرت. لم يبلغ عن وقوع إصابات خطيرة، غير انه اتعالجوا على الأقل خمس أشخاص كانوا موجودين في مكان الانفجار من أعراض الصدمة. محدش كان جوه الشقة. 100 شخص تقريبًا في المنطقة دي اتهجروا منها.
mt: A gas leak in Macbeth Street exploded, according to reports. A gas company official arrived at the scene after a neighbor reported a gas leak. When the official arrived, the house exploded. No serious injuries were reported, but at least five people present at the scene were treated for shock. No one was home in the house. About 100 people in the area were evacuated.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: كان من ضمن الخسائر نيكولاس ألدين اللي عنده خمسة وعشرين سنة وذاكاري كوديباك اللي عنده واحد وعشرين سنة، وكان كوديباك شغال سواق. إدجار فيجويلا اتصاب بجروحٍ في دراعه وفكه بس كريستوفر شنايدر كان محتاج لجراحة ترميم لوشه. شنايدر بيعاني من ألم مستمر، وعمى في واحدة من العينين، وفقد جزء من الجمجمة ووجه اتعاد بناؤه من التيتانيوم، كل ده حصل في وقت سلاح أوكا كان متصوب ناحية رأس رجل خامس. شنايدر قال شهادته عن طريق رابط فيديو من قاعدة للقوات الجوية الأمريكية موجودة في بلده.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cudnik, who was driving the car, were among the casualties. Edgar Figueroa suffered broken arms and facial fractures, while Christopher Schneider required reconstructive surgery to his face. Schneider suffered from constant pain, and lost an eye, and had part of his skull and face rebuilt with titanium, all of which happened when an Oka tank was fired at a fifth man. Schneider gave his testimony via a video link from an American airbase in his home country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: الجولف والرجبي هيرجعوا تاني للألعاب الأولمبية . اللجنة الأولمبية الدولية صوتت على إدراج الرياضات في اجتماع المجلس التنفيذي في برلين النهارده. واختارت لعبة الرغبي، وبالذات اتحاد الرغبي، والجولف عشان تشارك في الأولمبياد بدل خمس رياضات تانية. حاولت رياضات الاسكواش والكاراتيه والكرة الدوارة الدخول إلى البرنامج الأولمبي وبرده بالنسبة البيسبول والكرة اللينة، اللي إتصوت عليها خارج دورة الألعاب الأولمبية في 2005. تصديق اللجنة الأولمبية الدولية بشكل كامل على التصويت لسه لازم في اجتماعها في شهر أكتوبر في مدينة كوبنهاجن.
mt: Golf and rugby are returning to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports in a meeting of the executive council in Berlin today. It chose rugby union and golf to participate in the Olympics instead of five other sports. The sports of squash, karate, and baseball were also considered. Baseball and softball were voted out of the Olympic program in 2005. The International Olympic Committee's final approval of the vote will be in a meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: في يوم أربعة وعشرين سبتمبر 1759، آرثر غينيس وقع على عقد إيجار مدته 9000 سنة لمصنع الخمور سانت جيمس جيت في دبلن بأيرلندا. بعد لما عدا 250 سنةً بقيت شركة غينيس حاجة عالمية فخمة خالص وبتحقق دلوقتي فلوس ضخمة جدًا أكتر من 10 مليار يورو (يعني 14.7 مليار دولار أمريكي) كل سنة.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9000-year lease for the St. James's Gate brewery in Dublin, Ireland. After 250 years, Guinness is still a global luxury brand and today generates more than 10 billion euros (14.7 billion U.S. dollars) in revenue each year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: بطة برية ميتة اتأكد إصابتها بسلالة إنفلونزا الطيور القاتلة للإنسان، H5N1، ولقوها يوم الاثنين، في مستنقعات قريبة من ليون في شرق فرنسا. فرنسا بتعتبر سابع بلد في الاتحاد الأوروبي بيعاني من الفيروس ده؛ بعد النمسا وألمانيا وسلوفينيا وبلغاريا واليونان وإيطاليا. الحالات المشتبه في إصابتها بفيروس H5N1 في كرواتيا والدنمارك لسه مش مؤكدة.
mt: A dead wild duck was confirmed to have been infected with the deadly bird flu virus, H5N1, and found on Monday, in marshes near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh European Union country to suffer from the virus; after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Cases of suspected H5N1 infection in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: يُلام  قوات حفظ السلام التابعة للأمم المتحدة اللى جم لهايتي بعد زلزال 2010 ، على انتشار المرض اللى ابتدا قرب معسكر القوات. حسب الدعوى القضائية، زبالة معسكر الأمم المتحدة متعقمتش كويس، وده اتسبب فى دخول البكتيريا لرافد نهر أرتيبونايت واحد من أكبر روافد نهر هايتي. قبل وصول القوات، مكانتش هايتي واجهت مشاكل ليها علاقة بالمرض من القرن التسعتاشر. المعهد الهايتي للعدالة والديمقراطية اتكلم عن دراسات مستقلة تقترح أنه كتيبة حفظ السلام النيبالية التابعة للأمم المتحدة جابت المرض بدون علم منها إلى هايتي. قالت دانييلا لانتين اللي هي واحدة من خبراء المرض في للأمم المتحدة إن الاحتمال الكبير تكون قوات حفظ السلام ورا انتقال العدوى المرض.
mt: The United Nations peacekeeping forces are being sued for the spread of disease after the 2010 earthquake. The lawsuit alleges that the United Nations camp waste is not properly disposed of, and this has led to the entry of bacteria into the Artonne River, one of the largest tributaries of the river of Haiti. Before the arrival of the peacekeeping forces, Haiti had not faced any health problems related to the disease in the 20th century. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy spoke about independent studies that suggest that the Nepalese peacekeeping force brought the disease to Haiti without their knowledge. Daniela Lantini, who is one of the disease experts in the United Nations, said that the disease is likely to be spread by the peacekeeping forces.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: يُلام  قوات حفظ السلام التابعة للأمم المتحدة اللى جم لهايتي بعد زلزال 2010 ، على انتشار المرض اللى ابتدا قرب معسكر القوات. حسب الدعوى القضائية، زبالة معسكر الأمم المتحدة متعقمتش كويس، وده اتسبب فى دخول البكتيريا لرافد نهر أرتيبونايت واحد من أكبر روافد نهر هايتي. قبل وصول القوات، مكانتش هايتي واجهت مشاكل ليها علاقة بالمرض من القرن التسعتاشر. المعهد الهايتي للعدالة والديمقراطية اتكلم عن دراسات مستقلة تقترح أنه كتيبة حفظ السلام النيبالية التابعة للأمم المتحدة جابت المرض بدون علم منها إلى هايتي. قالت دانييلا لانتين اللي هي واحدة من خبراء المرض في للأمم المتحدة إن الاحتمال الكبير تكون قوات حفظ السلام ورا انتقال العدوى المرض.
mt: The United Nations peacekeeping forces are being sued for the spread of disease after the 2010 earthquake. The lawsuit alleges that the United Nations camp waste is not properly disposed of, and this has led to the entry of bacteria into the Artonne River, one of the largest tributaries of the river of Haiti. Before the arrival of the peacekeeping forces, Haiti had not faced any health problems related to the disease in the 20th century. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy spoke about independent studies that suggest that the Nepalese peacekeeping force brought the disease to Haiti without their knowledge. Daniela Lantini, who is one of the disease experts in the United Nations, said that the disease is likely to be spread by the peacekeeping forces.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "الحكومة الأيرلندية بتأكد أن فيه ضرورة لإصدار تشريعٍ من البرلمان لتصحيح الوضع. متحدث باسم الحكومة قال: ""مهم دلوقتي سواءً من حيث الصّحة العامّة أو من حيث العدالة الجنائية أن التّشريع يتسن في أسرع ما يمكن"". وزير الصحة قال إنه قلقان على صحة الأفراد اللي بيستغلوا الشرعية المؤقتة بتاعة المواد المتعلقة، والإدانات المتعلقة بالمخدرات من أول ما دخلت التغييرات غير الدستورية التنفيذ."
mt: "The Irish government confirmed that there is a need for legislation from parliament to correct the situation. A government spokesman said: "The most important thing now, both in terms of public health and criminal justice, is that legislation is passed as quickly as possible." The health minister said he was concerned about the individuals who were exploiting the interim legislation on controlled substances, and drug-related convictions from the moment the changes were made outside the constitution."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "المتحدث باسم شرطة لوس أنجلوس كريستوفر جارسيا قال إن الرجل المتهم  اللي مشتبهين بيتحقق معاه بتهمة التعدي على ممتلكات الغير ومش التخريب. اللافتة محصلهاش ضرر مادي؛ ده عشان المتعدي استخدم تربولين أسود متزين بعلامة السلام ورسمة لقلب في تعديلاته عشان تغيير شكل حرف ال ""O"" ليبدو كحرف ""e""."
mt: "Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Christopher Garcia said the suspect believed to be responsible for the vandalism is being questioned on suspicion of felony vandalism. The sign was not damaged; the vandal used black spray paint with a peace sign and a heart in his modifications to change the shape of the letter ""O"" to look like the letter ""e""."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: "وقال أنه كان عنده 9000 طالب في ذروة حياته المهنية استعمل في الملاحظات بتاعته كلمات بعض الآباء شافها مسيئة، واتقال أنه استعمل ألفاظ سوقية في الصف الدراسي. مدرسة التعليم الحديث اتهمته أن هو طبع إعلانات ضخمة على الأتوبيسات بدون تصريح وادعى كذب أنه كان مدرس أول اللغة الإنجليزية. كمان اتهموه قبل كده إنه انتهك حقوق الملكية ولكن متمش إدانته. قال طالب سابق إنه كان يستعمل اللغة العامية في الفصل، وكان بيدرس مهارات المواعدة في الملاحظات، وكان يعامل الطلاب على أنهم أصدقائه."""
mt: "He had 9,000 students at the peak of his career, used his notes to write some parents' comments he found offensive, and was accused of using vulgar language in the classroom. The Modern Education School accused him of printing large ads on buses without permission and claimed he lied about being an English teacher. He was previously accused of copyright infringement but was acquitted. A former student said he used slang in class, was teaching dating skills in his notes, and treated students as if they were his friends."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: اتجرأ شرطي كان بيعمل في الحكومة إنه يخطف سياح جايين من هونغ كونغ رهائن بعد ما راح خطف حافلتهم في مدينة مانيلا عاصمة الفلبين. رولاندو ميندوزا ضرب نار من بندقيته م16على السواح. رهاين كتير تم إنقاذهم ومات ستة على الأقل لحد دلوقتي. ست رهاين اتحرروا بدري، بينهم أطفال وناس كبيرة في السن وكمان مصورين فلبينيين. المصورين أخدوا بعد كده مكان سيدة مسنة عشان كانت محتاجة أنها تروح المرحاض، وبعد كده أطلقوا نار على ميندوزا.
mt: A police officer who had worked for the government dared to kidnap tourists coming from Hong Kong as hostages after he kidnapped their bus in the capital of the Philippines, Manila. Rolando Mendoza shot a number of tourists. Several hostages were rescued, and at least six died so far. Seven hostages were freed immediately, including children and elderly people, and Filipino journalists. The journalists took an elderly woman to the bathroom, and then shot Mendoza.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: البرازيل أكبر دولة كاثوليكية في العالم، وكانت الكنيسة الكاثوليكية الرومانية بتعارض دايما تشريع زواج المثليين في البلاد. الكونجرس الوطني للبرازيل ناقش مسألة التشريع لمدة عشر سنين، والزيجات المدنية دي قانونية في ريو جراندي دو سول بس في الوقت الحالي. مشروع القانون الأصلي اتصاغ عن طريق عمدة ساو باولو اللي فات، مارتا سوبليسي، والتشريع المقترح، بعد ما اتعدل، بقا دلوقتي في ايد روبرتو جيفرسون. المحتجون عندهم أمل أنهم يجمعوا 1.2 مليون توقيع على عريضة عشان يرفعوها للجمعية الوطنية في شهر نوفمبر.
mt: Brazil is the world's largest Catholic country, and the Roman Catholic Church has always opposed same-sex marriage legislation in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated the issue for ten years, and civil unions are legal in Rio Grande do Sul at present. The original bill was drafted by the former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy, and the proposed legislation, after being amended, is currently in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures on a petition to be submitted to the National Assembly in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "الرياح بدأت تدخل بعد خمس دقائق من بداية العرض، وبعد دقيقة وصلت سرعة الرياح إلى 70 كم في الساعة... وبعد كده الدنيا مطرت، لكن بصعوبة وغزارة لدرجة أنه بيضرب في جلدك زي الإبرة، وبعد كده الدنيا مطرت بشدة والناس اتفزعوا وصرخوا وجريوا فوق بعضهم. أرماند فرساتشي قال:"" ماتت أختي وصديقتها، وفي طريقي لقيت شخصين عاجزين قاعدين على كرسي متحرك، وكان الناس بيجروا ويدفعوهم برده."
mt: "The wind started to enter after five minutes of the show, and after a minute the wind speed reached 70 km/h... and then the sky rained, but with difficulty and abundance to the extent that it stings your skin like a needle, and then the sky rained heavily and people panicked and screamed and ran over each other. Armand Frascati said: "My sister and her friend died, and on my way I met two disabled people sitting on a wheelchair, and people were running and pushing them back."
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: في الغالب، هتنتهي العاصفة، اللي موجودة حوالي 645 ميل (1040 كم) غرب جزر الرأس الأخضر، قبل ما تهدد أي مناطق على اليابسة، زي ما بيقول خبراء التنبؤ المناخي. سرعة فريد دلوقتي حوالي ١٠٥ميل فى الساعة ( ١٦٥ كم / الساعة) وبيتجه للشمال الغربي. فريد دا أقوى إعصار استوائي سجلوه لحد دلوقتي في جنوب وشرق المحيط الأطلسي من أول ما ظهرت صور الأقمار الصناعية، وكمان ثالث أكبر إعصار سجلوه شرق درجة 35 في الغرب.
mt: The storm, located about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, is expected to dissipate before threatening any land areas, as forecasters say.  Fred's current speed is about 105 mph (165 km/h) and is moving northwest.  Fred is the strongest hurricane ever recorded in the South and East Atlantic since satellite imagery began, and the third largest hurricane ever recorded in the West Atlantic east of 35 degrees.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: معيار 802.11n اللاسلكي بيشتغل على ترددي 2.4 جيجاهرتز و5.0 جيجاهرتز. ده  بيسمح بالتوافق مع إصدارات السابقة  802.11a و 802.11b و 802.11g بشرط أن المحطة الأساسية يكون عندها أجهزة راديو مزدوجة. سرعات 802.11n أكبر بكثير من سرعات اللي سبقوه بناتج نظري أقصاه 600 ميجابايت في التانية.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands. This allows backward compatibility with previous versions 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radio devices. 802.11n speeds are much higher than those of its predecessors, with a theoretical maximum of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: لياقة اللي خد الميدالية الذهبية الأولمبية البدنية بقى مشكوك فيها بسبب تذمره، عشان كان متقرر ليه أن يسبح 100 م و 200 م أسلوب حر وفي تلات مراحل في دورة ألعاب الكومنولث. مقدرش ياخد الدواء اللي محتاجه عشان يتغلب على وجعه عشان ده ممنوع  في الألعاب.
mt: The gold medal-winning swimmer's fitness is in question because he was scheduled to swim 100 m and 200 m freestyle in three stages at the Commonwealth Games. He cannot take the medication he needs to overcome his illness because it is banned in competition.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: لياقة اللي خد الميدالية الذهبية الأولمبية البدنية بقى مشكوك فيها بسبب تذمره، عشان كان متقرر ليه أن يسبح 100 م و 200 م أسلوب حر وفي تلات مراحل في دورة ألعاب الكومنولث. مقدرش ياخد الدواء اللي محتاجه عشان يتغلب على وجعه عشان ده ممنوع  في الألعاب.

src: اللي كشفته خريطة الزلازل الدولية بتاعت المسح الجيولوجي في أمريكا، عدم وجود زلازل في أيسلندا في الأسبوع اللي فات. كمان مكتب الأرصاد الجوية الأيسلندي بلغ انه مافيش نشاط زلزالي في منطقة هيكلا خلال الـ 48 ساعة اللي فاتوا. النشاط الزلزالي الشديد اللي اتسبب في تغيير حالة البركان المعلنة حصل في يوم عشرة مارس على الناحية الشمالية الشرقية من البحيرات البركانية على القمة بتاعته. ظهرت غيم سودا ملهاش علاقة بأي نشاط بركاني عند قاعدة الجبل. الغيوم كشفت إمكانية حدوث ارتباك حول أن ممكن يكون حدث ثوران فعلي.
mt: The  International Seismological Centre's real-time earthquake map  showed no earthquakes in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office reported no seismic activity in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. Severe seismic activity that led to the change in the volcano's status occurred on March 10 on the northeast side of the crater lake on its peak. Dark clouds with no apparent connection to any volcanic activity appeared at the base of the mountain. The clouds suggested the possibility of confusion over whether an actual eruption had occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: المركبة المدارية القمرية غير المأهولة تشاندرايان-1 أطلقت مسبار مون إمباكت (MIP)، اللي اخترق سطح القمر بسرعة 1.5 كيلومتر في الثانية (3000 ميل في الساعة)، وقدر يهبط قريب من قطب القمر الجنوبي. لمسبار القمري كان على ضهره صورة العلم الوطني الهندي اللي كان مرسوم في كل جهة مع ثلاث أجهزة علمية مهمة،
mt: The Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter, which had been in orbit around the Moon since November 2008, released the Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which impacted the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3000 miles per hour) near the southern lunar pole. The lunar lander carried a national flag of India on all sides with three important scientific instruments,
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: اعلنوا عن أول حالات المرض الموسم ده اخر يوليو. المرض بيتنقل عن طريق الخنازير، وينتقل بعد كده للبشر عن طريق البعوض. انتشار الوباء خلى الحكومة الهندية تاخد إجراءات زي انها تنشر صيادين الخنازير في المناطق المتصابة أوي وكذلك أنهم يوزعوا آلاف من ستائر البعوض وأن ترش مبيدات حشرية. وعدت الحكومة إنها هتوفر ملايين من امبولات لقاح التهاب الدماغ، ودا هيساعد أن الوكالات الصحية تبقى جاهزة عشان السنة الجاية. خطط توصيل اللقاحات إلى المناطق المتضررة أكتر دي اتأجلت عشان نقص التمويل وعشان تحديد أولوية منخفضة للمرض بالمقارنة مع الأمراض التانية.
mt: The first cases of the year were announced in late July. The disease is transmitted by pigs, and then transmitted to humans by mosquitoes. The spread of the epidemic prompted the Indian government to take measures such as deploying pig hunters in affected areas and also distributing thousands of mosquito nets and spraying insecticides. The government said it would save millions of doses of encephalitis vaccine, which would help the health agencies be ready for next year. Plans to deliver vaccines to affected areas were delayed due to funding shortages and low priority for the disease compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: أقر المجلسين فعلا التعديل المقترح سنة 2011. حصل تغيير في الجلسة التشريعية دي، اتلغت الجملة الثانية في الأول من عند مجلس النواب ثم أُقروها بشكل مشابه في مجلس الشيوخ يوم الاثنين. فشل الجملة التانية، اللي بتقترح منع الاتحادات المدنية لشخصين من نفس الجنس، هتفتح الباب للاتحادات المدنية في المستقبل. هيتعمل فحص HJR-3 بعد العملية بحكم التشريعات المحدد إللي جاي إما في 2015 أو 2016 عشان تبقى مستمر في العمل.
mt: 2011, the proposed amendment was actually passed. There was a change in the legislative session, the second sentence in the first was repealed by the House of Representatives, then approved in a similar form in the Senate on Monday. The second sentence, which proposed to ban same-sex civil unions, would open the door to civil unions in the future. HJR-3 will undergo a HJR-3 after the process, according to the defined legislation, either in 2015 or 2016 to continue to work.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: وثائق بنما هو مصطلح شامل خاص بعشرة مليون وثيقة من شركة المحاماة البنمية موساك فونسيكا، اتسربت للصحافة في ربيع سنة 2016. الوثائق بينت أن أربعتاشر بنك ساعدوا ناس أغنياء علشان يخفوا ثروات بمليارات الدولارات عشان يتهربوا من الضرايب والتعليمات التانية. جريدة الجارديان البريطانية اقترحت انه دويتشه بنك سيطر تقريباً على ثلث من ال 1200 شركة قشرية مستعملة لتحقيق ده. كانت فيه احتجاجات في العالم كله، وكتير من المحاكمات الجنائية، وقادة حكومتي آيسلندا وباكستان قدموا استقالاتهم.
mt: The Panama Papers is the name given to the leak of 11.5 million confidential documents provided by the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which were published by the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) in April 2016. The documents show that fourteen banks helped wealthy people to hide their money from taxes and other regulations. The British newspaper The Guardian suggested that Deutsche Bank controlled almost a third of the 1200 shell companies used to achieve this. There were protests around the world, many criminal trials, and the prime ministers of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: بتحصل حوادث الطيران بشكل متكرر في إيران اللي عندها أسطول قديم وسيئ الصيانة للاستعمال المدني والعسكري العقوبات الدولية كان معناها انه مش ممكن تتشري طيارات جديدة . في بداية الأسبوع ده وقعت هليكوبتر للشرطة واتوفى ثلاث أشخاص واتصاب تلاتة تانيين. في الشهر اللي فات إيران حصل فيها أسوأ كارثة جوية من سنين لما اتحطمت طائرة رايحة أرمينيا، ومات في الحادث ده 168 شخص كانوا راكبينها. في الشهر نفسه اجتاحت طيارة ركاب تانية مدرجًا في مشهد وبعدين صدمت في جدار، وده نتج عنه قتل سبعتاشر شخص.
mt: Iran has a large fleet of old and poorly maintained civilian and military aircraft, and has suffered from frequent aviation accidents. Last week, a police helicopter crashed, killing three people and injuring three others. In the previous month, Iran suffered its worst aviation disaster in years when a passenger airliner crashed, killing 168 people on board. In the same month, a second passenger airliner ran off a runway in Mashhad and hit a wall, killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: مجموعة دراسة العراق قدمت تقريرها الساعة 12:00بتوقيت جرينتش النهارده. بيحذر من أن مافيش حد  يقدر يضمن ان أي عمل في العراق دلوقتى ممكن يوقف الحرب الطائفية والعنف اللي بيزيد و الفوضى. يبدأ التقرير ده بدعوة عشان يعملوا نقاش مفتوح، ويشكلوا اتفاق جماعي في الرأي في الولايات المتحدة عشان السياسة تجاه الشرق الأوسط. التقرير بينتقد أوي كل جوانب السياسة الحالية تقريبا بتاع السلطة التنفيذية ناحية العراق، وبيدعو لتغيير فوري في الاتجاه. أول توصية في 78 توصية بتاعتها هو أنه لازم يكون في مبادرة دبلوماسية قبل السنة دي ما تخلص عشان يأمنوا حدود العراق ضد التدخلات والعدوان وعشان كمان يبنوا العلاقات الدبلوماسية مع جيرانها من جديد.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today. It warns that there is no way to guarantee that any action in Iraq now can stop the sectarian violence, the increasing violence and chaos. The report begins by calling for an open discussion, and forming a consensus in the United States for a new policy towards the Middle East. The report criticizes almost all aspects of the current policy of the executive branch towards Iraq, and calls for an immediate change in direction. The first of 78 recommendations is that there should be a diplomatic initiative before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against incursions and attacks, and to rebuild diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "وزي ما قالت إذاعة ""أنسا إن الشّرطة خافت من وقوع عمليتين اغتيال تمس ناس كبيرة في البلد، ودا ممكن يسبب في نيران بين الورثة على الرياسة. الشرطة قالت إنه كان للو بيكولو الايد الطويلة عشان كان الايد اليمين لبروفنزانو في باليرمو وخبرته الكبيرة خلت الجيل الأكبر في العمر من الرؤساء يحترمه لأنهم اتبعوا سياسة بروفنزانو اللي هي عبارة عن البعد عن الأضواء لكن بيعززوا شبكة قوتهم. بروفنزانو وقف هؤلاء الرؤساء لما أنهى الحرب التي قادتها رينا ضد الدولة وسببت موت صليبي المافيا جيوفاني فالكون وباولو بورسيلينو سنة 1992."""
mt: "Radio Ansa said the police feared two assassination attempts would target important people in the country, which could cause a fire between the heirs to the presidency. The police said that the long arm of the law was for the left hand of Provenzano in Palermo and his great experience made the older generation of presidents respect him because they followed Provenzano's policy, which is to distance themselves from the limelight but strengthen their network. Provenzano stood by these presidents when he ended the war that Rina led against the state and caused the death of the mafioso Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: لاعب الجودو الياباني هيتوشي سايتو، اللي فاز بمداليتين ذهبيتين في الأولمبياد، مات وعمره 54 سنة. أعلنوا أن سبب الوفاة كان سرطان في القناة الصفراوية اللي جوه الكبد. مات في أوساكا يوم الثلاث. سايتو مش بس بطل أولمبي وعالمى سابق ، لكن كان برده رئيس للجنة التدريب التابعة لاتحاد الجودو  في اليابان كلها وقت وفاته.
mt: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, who won two gold medals at the Olympics, died at the age of 54. It was announced that the cause of death was bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on the 3rd. Saito was not only a former Olympic and world champion, but also the chairman of the training committee of the judo federation in Japan at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: وخلال رحلته، واجه إيواساكي مشاكل في أوقات كتيرة. سرقوه اللصوص وبعدين اتعرض لهجوم من كلب مسعور في التبت، ونجا من الزواج في نيبال، واتقبض عليه في الهند.
mt: During his travels, Iwasaki faced problems at many times. He was robbed by thieves and then attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, survived a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: جيانكارلو فيسيشيلا معرفش يتحكم فى عربيته وخلص السباق بعد وقت قصير من بدايته. زميله في الفريق فرناندو ألونسو كان متصدر معظم السباق، بس أنهاه علطول بعد ما وقف، إحتمال عشان العجلة الأمامية اليمنى إتعوجت أوي. مايكل شوماخر خلص السباق بعد ألونسو بمدة قصيرة بعد ما اتضرر نظام التعليق في الصراعات المتعددة وقت السباق.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella was unable to control his car and finished the race shortly after its start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was leading most of the race, but he was passed by Fisichella after he stopped, possibly due to a broken front right wheel. Michael Schumacher finished the race shortly after Alonso after his suspension system was damaged during multiple collisions during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: في التلت شهور اللي فاتت، طلع أكتر من 80 معتقل من منشأة سنترال بوكنج بدون ما يكون فيه تهم رسمية ليهم. في شهر أبريل من العام ده، طلع القاضي جلين أمر تقييدي مؤقت ضد المنشأة عشان يفرج عن المحتجزين لأكثر من 24 ساعة من لحظة احتجازهم وإللي مقعدوش في جلسة استماع من جانب مفوض الجلسة. المفوض بيلاقي الكفالة لو اتقررت وبيعملها بطابع رسمي على التهم اللي يوجهها الضابط اللي نفذ الاعتقال. وبتتسجل التهم في نظام الكمبيوتر الخاص بالولاية عشان يتابعوا القضية. جلسة الاستماع هتحدد برده تاريخ حق المشتبه فيه في محاكمة سريعة.
mt: 80+ detainees were released from Central Booking in the last 4 months without formal charges. In April of this year, Judge Glenn issued a temporary restraining order against Central Booking to release detainees within 24 hours of their arrest and not to be held in a hearing before a magistrate. The magistrate must approve bail if it is offered and make it official on the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state computer system to track the case. A hearing will also set a speedy trial date for the defendant.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: لودين قال كمان أن المسؤولين قرروا يلغوا جولة الإعادة عشان يوفروا على الأفغان التكاليف والمخاطر الأمنية اللي هتسببها الانتخابات التانية. دبلوماسيين قالوا إن الدستور الأفغاني مش واضح أوي عشان يعتبروا جولة الإعادة ملهاش لازمة. دا بيخالف تقارير سابقة وضحت أن إلغاء جولة الإعادة كان هيتعارض مع الدستور.
mt: Lodin also said that officials decided to cancel the runoff to provide Afghans with the costs and security risks that the second round would have caused. Diplomats said that the Afghan constitution is not clear enough to consider the runoff unnecessary. This contradicts previous reports that had indicated that the cancellation of the runoff would have violated the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "من أول ما استقلت باكستان عن الحكم البريطاني في عام 1947، الرئيس الباكستاني عين ""وكلا سياسيين"" عشان يحكموا المناطق القبلية اللي تحت الإدارة الاتحادية، واللي بيسيطروا بشكل كامل على المناطق. الوكلاء دول مسؤولين عن تقديم الخدمات الحكومية و القضائية عشان المادة 247 من الدستور الباكستاني."
mt: "Since Pakistan gained independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed "political agents" to govern the tribal areas under federal administration, which are completely controlled by them. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: الفيلم اللي فيه رايان جوسلينغ وإيما ستون، لقى ترشيحات في جميع الفئات الرئيسية. جوسلينغ وستون استلموا ترشيحات علشان يبقوا أحسن مممثل وممثلة. من بين الترشيحات التانية جائزة أحسن فيلم ومخرجٍ وتصويرٍ سينما وتصميم لبس ومونتاج وموسيقى تصويرية وتصميم إنتاج وتعديل الصوت وخلط الصوت وعرض سيناريو أصلي. خدت أغنيتان من الفيلم، تجربة أداء (The Fools Who Dream) وCity of Stars، ترشيحات أفضل أغنية أصلية. وحصل استوديو Lionsgate 26 على ترشيح أكتر من أي استوديو تاني.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress. Among the other nominations were Best Picture and Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the film, "The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars", were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations, the most of any studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: هيئة الإذاعة اليابانية قالت أن محطة الكاشيوازاكي كاريوا بتاعة الطاقة النووية في محافظة نيكاتا كانت شغالة عادي. شركة هوكوريكو للطاقة الكهربائية مبلغتش عن أي آثار للزلزال، بس قالت أن المفاعلين رقم 1 و2 في محطة شيكا للطاقة النووية اتقفلوا. التقارير قالت أن في المنطقة حوالي 9400 منزل مفيهوش مية وحوالي 100 منزل مفيهوش كهربة. شوية طرق اتدمرت وخدمات السكة الحديد وقفت في الأماكن المضررة، ومطار نوتو في مقاطعة إيشيكاوا لسه مقفول.
mt: Japan Broadcasting Corporation reported that the Kashima-Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Company has not reported any effects from the earthquake, but said that the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the Shika Nuclear Power Plant have been shut down. Reports said there were about 9,400 homes without water and about 100 homes without electricity in the area. Some roads were damaged and train services were halted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture is still closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: بحسب التسريب الوثيقة بتشير للخلاف على الحدود، اللي فلسطين عاوزاها على أساس الحدود إللي قبل حرب إللي حصلت في الشرق الأوسط سنة 1967. الموضوعات التانية اللي بيتقال أنها اتغطت تضمن حالة القدس في المستقبل واللي هي قضية مهمة عشان الشعبين ومشكلة وادي الأردن. إسرائيل بتطلب استمرار التواجد العسكري بالغور لمدة عشر سنين، أول ما يتوقع اتفاق، بس السلطة الفلسطينية بتوافق على أن التواجد ده يستمر لخمس سنوات بس.
mt: According to the leaked documents, the dispute over the borders, which Palestine wants on the basis of the borders before the war that took place in the Middle East in 1967. Other issues that are said to have been covered include the future of Jerusalem, which is an important issue for the people and the Jordan Valley problem. Israel is demanding the continued military presence in the valley for ten years, first expected to be agreed, but the Palestinian Authority agrees that this presence will continue for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: بحسب التسريب الوثيقة بتشير للخلاف على الحدود، اللي فلسطين عاوزاها على أساس الحدود إللي قبل حرب إللي حصلت في الشرق الأوسط سنة 1967. الموضوعات التانية اللي بيتقال أنها اتغطت تضمن حالة القدس في المستقبل واللي هي قضية مهمة عشان الشعبين ومشكلة وادي الأردن. إسرائيل بتطلب استمرار التواجد العسكري بالغور لمدة عشر سنين، أول ما يتوقع اتفاق، بس السلطة الفلسطينية بتوافق على أن التواجد ده يستمر لخمس سنوات بس.
mt: According to the leaked documents, the dispute over the borders, which Palestine wants on the basis of the borders before the war that took place in the Middle East in 1967. Other issues that are said to have been covered include the future of Jerusalem, which is an important issue for the people and the Jordan Valley problem. Israel is demanding the continued military presence in the valley for ten years, first expected to be agreed, but the Palestinian Authority agrees that this presence will continue for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "اتولد في هونغ كونغ، ودرس في جامعة نيويورك وكلية الحقوق في هارفارد، وبعد كده أخد ""البطاقة الخضراء"" عشان يقعد علطول في أمريكا. هسيه لمح والانتخابات شغالة إنه ممكن يهرب من البلاد وقت ظهور الأزمات. هسيه كان بيجادل كمان أن ما اللي جذاب من ناحية الشكل والصورة كان بيهتم بالشكل أكتر من الجوهر. على الرغم من الاتهامات دي، فاز ما بسهولة على منصة عايزة تقوي العلاقات مع البر الرئيسي الصيني."
mt: "Born in Hong Kong, he studied at New York University and Harvard Law School, and then took the "green card" to stay in the United States for a long time. He is a candidate for office who can flee the country when crises appear. He also argued that what was attractive in terms of appearance and image was more interested in appearance than substance. Despite these allegations, he easily won the platform to strengthen relations with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: بعد ما عرفنا أن عائلات كتيرة كانت منتظرة معونة من الحكومة علشان تتعامل مع تهجيره الإخلاء، فيه اجتماع اتعمل في 20 مارس في مركز اسمه إيست باي القانوني المجتمعي علشان يتكلموا عن ضحايا عمليات النصب في الإسكان. المستأجرين لما بدأوا يشاركوا اللي حصلهم، معظم العائلات اللي ليها علاقة بالموضوع عرفت فجأة أن كارولين ويلسون من هيئة الإسكان في أوكلاند اتسرقت ودائع التأمين الخاصة بيها، وهربت خارج المدينة. بيعتقد المستأجرون في لوكوود جاردينز أن  ٤٠ عيلة تانية أو أكثر مضطرين يخلوا بعد ما عرفوا أن شرطة أوكلاند بتحقق في ممتلكات سكنية عامة تانية في أوكلاند ممكن تكون متورطة في عملية الاحتيال.
mt: After learning that many families were awaiting government assistance to deal with the eviction, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center to discuss victims of housing scams. When tenants began to share what they had received, most families involved suddenly realized that Caroline Wilson of the Auckland Housing Authority had stolen their insurance deposits, and fled the city. It is believed that up to 40 other families may have been forced to leave after learning that Auckland police were investigating another public housing property in Auckland that may be involved in the fraud.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: "كيسلوسكي استمر بطل بطولة السائقين بعد السباق بعد ما خد 2250 نقطة. جونسون موجود في الموقع التاني ورصيده 2243 بفارق سبع نقاطٍ. في المركز الثالث، هاملين جا بعده بعشرين نقطة، بس اتقدم على بوير بخمس نقاط. وكين وترويكس الابن بييجوا في المركزين الخامس والسادس ورا بعض، بـ2,220 و2,207 نقطة. ستيوارت و""دجوردون"" و""كينسيث"" و""هارفيك"" حقق المراكز العشرة الأولى في بطولة السائقين ولسه فاضل أربع سباقات في الموسم."
mt: "Keselowski continued to lead the drivers' championship after the race after scoring 2250 points. Johnson is in second place with 2243 points, seven points behind. Hamlin is in third place, 20 points behind, but advanced over Bowyer by five points. Kenseth and Truex Jr. finished fifth and sixth, respectively, with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick finished in the top ten in the drivers' championship with four races remaining in the season."
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: بيتظن أن دي هي المرة الخامسة في التاريخ اللي بيلاحظ فيها الناس ما تبين أنه مادة مريخية مؤكدة من الناحية الكيماوية بتسقط على الأرض. من بين حوالي 24,000 نيزك معروف وقع على الأرض، بان أن 34 منها بس أصلها من المريخ. خمستاشر من الصخور كان سببها الشهب اللي نزلت في يوليو اللي فات. بعض الصخور النادرة أوي على الأرض بتتباع بسعر بيبدأ من 11,000 دولار أمريكي إلى 22,500 دولار أمريكي للأوقية، وده زيادة بنحو عشرة أضعاف عن تكلفة الذهب.
mt: It is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what is believed to be a confirmed Martian material falling to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen to Earth, only 34 have been found to be from Mars. Sixteen of the rare rocks are on Earth because of meteorites that fell in July. Some rare rocks are worth between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, an increase of about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: كان مقرر أن شوماخر المتقاعد في سنة 2006 بعد ما فاز ببطولة الفورمولا 1 سبع مرات يجي مكان فليب ماسا بعد ما اتصاب. إتعرض البرازيلي لإصابة خطيرة في الراس بعد حادثة فى سباق الجايزة الكبرى المجري لسنة ٢٠٠٩. من المقرر أن يخرج ماسا على الأقل حتى نهاية موسم 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who retired in 2006 after winning seven titles, was set to replace Felipe Massa after the Brazilian was injured. He suffered a serious head injury in the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009. Massa is expected to be out at least until the end of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: شركةإيه أو إل كانت قادرة لحد دلوقتي أنها تحرك وتطور سوق الرسائل الفورية على وتيرتها الخاصة، عشان استعمالها على نطاقٍ واسعٍ جوه أمريكا. مع وجود الترتيب ده، ممكن تنتهي الحرية دي. عدد مستعملي موقع ياهو! و خدمات مايكروسوفت مجتمعة هتنافس إيه أو إل في عدد العملاء.
mt: AOL has been able to thus far maintain its own pace of growth and development in the instant messaging market, as its use has become widespread in the United States. With this arrangement, the freedom of AOL may end. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will compete with AOL in the number of customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: انفجرت سيارة مفخخة إمبارح الصبح في قسم شرطة في غازي عنتاب في تركيا، واتقتل ظابطين حكومة واتصاب أكتر من عشرين واحد تاني. مكتب المحافظ قال أن تسعتاشر شخص من المصابين كانوا ضباط شرطة. الشرطة قالت إنها بتشتبه أن يكون حد من بتوع داعش هو اللي عمل الهجوم.
mt: A car bomb exploded early this morning in a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two officers and injuring more than twenty others. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected a member of ISIS was responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: حاكم ولاية ماساتشوستس الي فات مت رومني فاز فى الانتخابات التمهيدية  الرئاسية للحزب الجمهوري في فلوريدا يوم الثلاث، بأكثر من ٤٦٪ من الأصوات. نيوت جينجريتش، رئيس مجلس النواب الأمريكي اللي فات،جه في المركز التاني بنسبة 32 بالمية. أدت فلوريدا على أساس إن الفائز ليه الحق في الفوز بكل حاجة كل أصوات المندوبين الخمسة بتوعها لرومني، وكانت نتيجته إن مركزه بقى قوى وبكده يكون المرشح الأول في قايمة الحزب الجمهوري.
mt: Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's Florida primary on Tuesday, with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, who dropped out of the race, came in second with 32 percent. Florida's 50 delegates were awarded to Romney on a winner-take-all basis, strengthening his position as the party's front-runner.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: حاكم ولاية ماساتشوستس الي فات مت رومني فاز فى الانتخابات التمهيدية  الرئاسية للحزب الجمهوري في فلوريدا يوم الثلاث، بأكثر من ٤٦٪ من الأصوات. نيوت جينجريتش، رئيس مجلس النواب الأمريكي اللي فات،جه في المركز التاني بنسبة 32 بالمية. أدت فلوريدا على أساس إن الفائز ليه الحق في الفوز بكل حاجة كل أصوات المندوبين الخمسة بتوعها لرومني، وكانت نتيجته إن مركزه بقى قوى وبكده يكون المرشح الأول في قايمة الحزب الجمهوري.
mt: Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's Florida primary on Tuesday, with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "رئيس مجلس النواب اللي فات نيوت جينجريتش، وحاكم تكساس ريك بيري، وعضو الكونجرس ميشيل باكمان خدوا المراكز الرابع والخامس والسادس بالترتيب. بعد ظهور النتايج، مدح جينجريتش سانتوروم بس قالت شوية كلام صعب في حق رومني، اللي نشرت حملة إعلامية سلبية وحشة خالص;آيوا ضد جينجريتش بدل منه. بيري قال ""هرجع تكساس عشان أقيم نتائج المؤتمر الحزبي بتاع الليلة، و هحدد لو فيه مسار عشان اتقدم في السباق ده""، لكنه قال بعد كده أنه هيبقى في السباق وهينافس في انتخابات كارولاينا الجنوبية في واحد وعشرين يناير. قررت باخمان اللي فازت في استفتاء ايمز سترو في أغسطس إنها تنهي حملتها الانتخابية."
mt: "House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann took the fourth, fifth, and sixth spots, respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum for a tough campaign against Romney, who ran a negative and vicious media campaign; Iowa against Gingrich instead. Perry said ""I'm going back to Texas to celebrate the Republican convention tonight, and I'll decide if there's a path forward in this race"", but later said he would continue to run and compete in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "موقع المحطة الإلكتروني وصف العمل بأنه ""مسرح إذاعي طريقته قديمه، وفيه ميل غريب الأطوار، جديد وكبير!"" في أيامه الأولانية، اتذاع البرنامج حصري على موقع راديو الإنترنت الموجود بقاله فترة كبيرة توجي نت راديو والموقع ده بيركز على الراديو الحواري. في أخر 2015، أنشأت توجي نت راديو أسترو نت عشان يبقى محطة إذاعية تابعة ليهم. البرنامج عرض في الأساس ممثلي صوت الهواة، من محلية إلى شرق تكساس."
mt: "The website described the show as "old-fashioned radio drama, with a strange, new, big twist!" in its early days, the program was exclusive to the Internet radio station TogiNet Radio, which focused on radio drama. In late 2015, TogiNet Radio launched AstroNet Radio as a sister station. The program featured amateur voice actors, from local to East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: مفجرو مومباي وصلوا عن طريق مركب في 26 نوفمبر 2008، جايبين معاهم قنابل يدوية وأسلحة آلية وضربوا أهداف كتير منها خط سكة حديد شاتراباتي شيفاجي الزحمة وفندق تاج محل المشهور. التدوير عن المعلومات وجمعها اللي قام به ديفيد هيدلي ساعد في تنفيذ العملية اللي عملها 10 مسلحين في جماعة لشكر طيبة الباكستانية المسلحة. الهجوم خلي فيه توتر ضخم في العلاقات بين الهند وباكستان.
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by sea, bringing with them hand grenades and automatic weapons and struck a number of targets including the Chhatrapati Shivaji railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. The collection and dissemination of information carried out by David Headley helped to carry out the operation carried out by 10 armed militants in the Pakistani armed group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack caused a major strain in relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "السجل بتاع تاريخ مواجهات نادال مع الكندي هو 7–2. خسر في وقت قريب قدام راونيتش في بطولة بريسبان المفتوحة. نادال خد نقاط على الشبكة بنسبة 88% في المباراة، عشان يفوز بـ76 نقطة في الإرسال الأول. بعد لما المباراة خلصت، قال ""ملك الملاعب الترابية"" أنا متحمس إني أرجع في الجولات الأخيرة المهمة وهعمل كل جهدي علشان أفوز بالبطولة."""
mt: "Nadal's record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open final. Nadal took 88% of the points on serve in the first set, winning 76 points. After the match, "King of Clay" said I'm excited to be back in the important last games and I will do my best to win the title."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: في الأسبوع اللي فات، أعلنت Naked News أنها هتزود بشكل كبير من تفويضها الخاص باللغة الدولية في أنها تجهز التقارير الإخبارية ببث تلات برامج جديدة. بتعد المنظمة العالمية تقارير بالإنجليزية واليابانية، وبتطلق برامج بلغات زي الإسبانية والإيطالية والكورية للتليفزيون والإنترنت والتلفون.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced it would be expanding its international franchise by launching three new news programs. The organization currently produces reports in English and Japanese, and will be launching programs in languages such as Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, the Internet and the telephone.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: كاربانيدو دخل في سباقين فرديين في البطولة بسبب الموضوع اللي شوفناه يوم الأربع. أول سباق شاركت فيه هو سباق التزلج المتعرج، بس نتيجتها منهتش السباق من أول جوله ليه. وخد 36 من بين 116 من اللي بينافسوا على نفس النتيجة في السباق ده. وفي السباق التاني وهو سباق التزلج المتعرج العملاق خدت المركز العاشر في مجموعة جلوس السيدات بعد ما جريت مدة 4:41.30، ودا أبطأ بـ 2:11.60 دقيقة عن اللي خدت المركز الأول النمساوية كلوديا لوش، و 1:09.02 دقيقة عن اللي خدت المركز التاسع المجرية جيونجيي داني. في السباق النسائي ،أربعة متسابقات مكملوش السباق ، و 45 من أصل 117 متسابقة مسجلوش نقط في سباق  التعرج العملاق.
mt: In the first race, she competed in the downhill, but did not finish the first run. She took 36th out of 116 competitors in the same race. In the second race, the giant slalom, she took tenth in the ladies' standing group after running 4:41.30, which was slower by 2:11.60 minutes than the first-place Austrian Claudia Lötsch and 1:09.02 minutes than the ninth-place Hungarian Jóna Jánosik. In the ladies' race, four competitors did not finish the race, and 45 out of 117 competitors scored points in the giant slalom.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: وقف الاتحاد الوطني لكرة السلة بالولايات المتحدة (إن بي إيه) يوم الأربع موسمه الاحترافي لكرة السلة بسبب مخاوف من  فيروس كورونا المستجد. قرار رابطة الوطنية لكرة السلة جه بعد ختبار لاعب يوتا جاز إيجابي لفيروس كوفيد-19.
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its 2019–20 season on March 11 due to concerns over the coronavirus. The decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: لاعبنا للنهارده أليكس أوفيتشكين وهو واحد من لاعبي فريق واشنطن كابيتالز. في فوز واشنطن ٥:٣ على أتلانتا تراشيرز ، سجل هدفين و 2 تمريرات حاسمة. مرر أوفشكين التمريرة الحاسمة الأولى بتاعته النهارده في هدف الفوز بتاع المباراة اللي جابه الصاعد نيكلاس باكستروم؛ الجون التاني الليلة كان رقم 60 له في الموسم ده، وبكده أصبح أول لاعب يسجل 60 جون أو أكتر في موسم واحد من موسم 1995-1996 لما نجح كل من جارومير جاجر وماريو ليميكس في الوصول للإنجاز ده.
mt: Our player of the day is Alex Ovechkin, one of the Washington Capitals. In Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers, he scored two goals and two assists. Ovechkin's first assist of the night came on the game-winning goal to Niklas Backstrom; the second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 goals or more in a single season since 1995-1996, when both Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished the feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
