src: "البحرية الأمريكية قالت أنها بردوا بتحقق في الحادث. وضحوا في بيان أن ""الطاقم يعمل دلوقتي عشان يحدد أفضل وسيلة عشان ينتشلوا السفينة بأمان"". كانت السفينة في طريقها إلى بويرتو برنسيسا  في بالاوان وهي سفينة مضادة للألغام من طراز أفينجر. بقى في الأسطول السابع بتاع البحرية الأمريكية اللي في ساسيبو، ناجازاكي في اليابان."
mt: "The U.S. Navy said it was investigating the incident. They stated in a statement that ""the crew is currently working to determine the best way to safely remove the ship"". The ship was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan, a mine countermeasure ship of the class Avenger. It remained in the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan."
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: في وقت متأخر يوم الأحد قال رئيس أمريكا دونالد ترامب، في بيان قاله السكرتير الصحفي إن القوات الأميركية هتسيب سوريا. الإعلان اتعمل بعد ترامب عمل اتصال مع الرئيس التركي رجب الطيب أردوغان. تركيا هتتولى بردو حراسة مقاتلي داعش الممسوكين ، وقال البيان إن الدول الأوروبية رفضت ترجعهم.
mt: Late Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement released by the press secretary, said U.S. forces will remain in Syria. The announcement came after Trump spoke with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Turkey will also take custody of captured ISIS fighters, the statement said, and European countries refused to repatriate them.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: قوات التحالف والقوات الأفغانية راحوا للمنطقة علشان يأمنوا الموقع وطيارات التحالف التانية جت عشان تساعد. حادث التحطم حصل في أعالي التضاريس بتاعت الجبل، وبيقولوا أنه نيران عدوة هي السبب. جهود التدوير عن موقع التحطم بيقابلها صعوبات كتيرة خالص في الجو والتضاريس الصعبة.
mt: Alliied and Afghan forces were sent to the area to secure the site and other allied aircraft were sent to assist. The crash occurred in mountainous terrain, and officials say enemy fire was the cause. Efforts to turn the crash site are being hampered by difficult weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: بعد ما اتبنى السد في سنة 1963، الفيضانات الموسمية اتوقفت بعد ما كانت بتنشر الرواسب في النهر كله. الرواسب دي كانت ضرورية لتكوين حواجز رملية وشواطئ، ودا كان زي موطن للحياة البرية. عشان كده، مات نوعين من الأسماك، بس في نوعين تانيين في خطر، منهم الشوب الأحدب. مع أن مستوى الميه هيرتفع سيرتفع كام قدم بعض الفيضان، لكن المسؤولين الكبار بيأملوا أن ده يكون كافي لاستعادة قضبان الرمال اللي اتعرضت للتآكل ناحية مجرى النهر.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, seasonal floods stopped after they had deposited sediment in the entire river. These sediments were necessary to form sandbars and beaches, and this was the home of wildlife. So, two fish species went extinct, but two others are at risk, including the sturgeon. Although the water level will rise by up to 30 feet during the flood, senior officials hoped this would be enough to restore the sandbars that had eroded near the river's main channel.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "سفارة أمريكا الموجودة في نيروبي في كينيا طلعت تحذير أن ""متطرفين من الصومال"" بيخططوا عشان ينفذوا هجمات انتحارية في كينيا وإثيوبيا. أمريكا بتقول أنها اتوصلت لمعلومات من مصدر مجهول تذكر بالذات استعمال انتحاريين عشان تفجير ""معالم مشهورة"" في إثيوبيا وكينيا."
mt: "The U.S. Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, issued a warning that "radicalized Somalis" are planning suicide attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. said it had received unspecified information from an unknown source about the use of suicide bombers to attack "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "المحامين اليونانيين المشهورين، ساكيس كيتشاجيوجلو وجورج نيكولاكوبولوس اتسجنوا في سجن أثينا بكوريذالوس، عشان هما متهمين بالكسب غير المشروع والفساد. الكشف عن الأفعال غير القانونية للقضاة والمحامين والمستشارين القانونيين ورجال القانون في السنين الأخيرة أدى إلى فضيحة كبيرة فى المجتمع القانوني اليوناني. بعدما ما عدت أسابيع قليلة وبعد المعلومات إللي ذاعها الصحفي ماكيس تريانتافيلوبولوس في برنامجه التلفزيوني المشهور ""زونجلا"" على قناة ألفا تي في، مشوا عضو البرلمان والأبوكاتو بيتروس مانتوفالوس علشان في ناس في مكتبه اتورطوا في جرائم حرام ونصب واحتيال. القاضي الأعلى إيفانجيلوس كالوسيس اتسجن بسب تهم الفساد والسلوك المنحل."
mt: "The famous Greek lawyers, Saki Kitchagioyglou and George Nikolakopoulos were imprisoned in the Corinthia prison in Athens, because they are accused of illegal gain and corruption. The revelation of the illegal actions of judges, lawyers, legal advisers and legal men in recent years led to a major scandal in the Greek legal community. After a few weeks and after the information was leaked by journalist Makis Triantafyllopoulos in his famous TV show "Zongla" on Alpha TV, members of parliament and abbot Petros Mantovas went to people in his office who were involved in illegal crimes and fraud. The Supreme Court Judge Evangelos Kalosios was imprisoned on charges of corruption and improper behavior."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: روبن أوثابا حقق أعلى نتيجة في الجولات، سبعين ركضة في واحد وربعين كرة بس وسجل حداشر من الأربع واتنين من الـستات. ضاربي الكرة اللي في الوسط، ساشين تيندولكار وراهول درافيد، لعبوا خلو وعملوا شراكة كسبت الفريق مائة نقطة. بس بعد ما الكابتن خسر التسديد في الويكيت، الهند كسبت 36 جولة بس خسرت فيهم 7 تسديدات على الويكيت عشان تخلص الأشواط.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score in the innings, 70 runs in 42 balls and scored 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle-order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, played alone and made a partnership that scored 100 points. But after the captain missed the shot in the wicket, India won 36 innings but lost 7 shots on the wicket to finish the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: مدير مجلس العموم آدم كويردين قال أنه محبط بسبب عمليات الشطب لما اتكلم مع ويكي نيوز الشهر اللي فات. ويلز كدب علينا من أول الأمر. في البداية لما اتصرف وكأن ده عشان أسباب قانونية. وبعد كده لما اتظاهر أنه بيستمع لينا، وحتى بعد ما حذفوه فنيًا. انزعاج المجتمع أدى أنه تحصل جهود عشان انه يصيغوا سياسة عشان المحتوى الجنسي للموقع اللي فيه ملايين الوسائط المرخصة بشكل مفتوح.
mt: Speaker of the House Adam Quirk said he was disappointed by the deletions he had with WikiNews last month. Wales initially acted as if this was for legal reasons. Then he pretended to listen to us, and even after they were deleted, the community's frustration led to efforts to develop a policy for the site with millions of licensed open content.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "مكنش الكل بيدعم إدراج رتب الستات. وقال أمير خان اللي أخد الميدالية الفضية في أولمبياد سنة 2004، ""شايف أن الست مينفعش تدخل تلعب في المصارعة والقتال من رأيه."" بالرغم من تعليقاته، لكن قال إنه هيدعم المتنافسين البريطانيين في أولمبياد 2012 اللي هتكون في لندن."
mt: "Not everyone supports the inclusion of women. Amir Khan, who won the silver medal at the 2004 Olympics, said, 'I don't think women should be allowed to compete in wrestling and fighting from his point of view.' Despite his comments, he said he would support the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics in London."
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: راكب الدراجات النارية اللي عنده تلاتاشر سنة بيتر لينز مات بعد ما اتعرض لحادث في طريق سير انديانابوليس السريع لما كان لينز في جولة الإحماء، سقط من دراجته، ثم صدمه المتسابق زافيير زيات زميله. اتعالج علطول بالطريقة الصحيحة من خلال الطاقم الطبي واتنقل إلى مستشفى محلي واتوفى بعد كده. الزيات متعرضش لأي إصابة في الحادث.
mt: 13-year-old motorcyclist Peter Lenz died after being involved in an accident on the Indianapolis Motor Speedway track during warm-up, falling from his bike, then being struck by fellow competitor Xavier Zayat. He was treated properly by the medical team and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: السفر بالطيارة ممكن يكون تجربة مرعبة للأشخاص من جميع الأعمار والخلفيات، بالذات لو مسافروش من قبل أو تعرضوا لحادث مؤلم. هو مش حاجة نخجل منها: عشان هو ميختلفش كتير عن المخاوف الشخصية و الحاجات التانية المكروهة و اللي هي عند كتير من الناس. انك  تفهم الطيارة شغالة إزاى أو إيه اللى بيحصل خلال الرحلة ممكن يساعد بعض الناس في التغلب على الخوف من المجهول أو الشعور بعدم السيطرة.
mt: Travel by plane can be a frightening experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if they have flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: like personal fears and other disliked things, it is common among many people. Understanding how the plane works or what happens during the flight can help some people overcome the fear of the unknown or feeling out of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: في أيامنا  دي، نادرا ما بتحجز رحلات جوية مباشرة مع شركة الطيران  من غير ما تدور على أسعار وتقارنها الأول. أسعار رحلة الطيران الواحدة ممكن تختلف بشكل كبير بين مختلف محركات بحث الرحلات، وهيكون كويس إنك تقارن نتائج البحث وتشوف موقع شركة الطيران نفسها قبل الحجز.
mt: In our days, it is rare to book flights directly with an airline without first searching and comparing prices. Flight prices can vary greatly between different search engines, so it is a good idea to compare the results and check the airline's website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: شركات الشحن بتاخد فلوس كويسة عشان توصل الحاجات بسرعة. والوقت في العادي بيكون الوقت مهم أوي عشان مستندات العمل والبضائع وقطع الغيار اللي محتاجة تتصلح بشكل عاجل. الشركات الأكبر بتملك طياراتها الخاصة، في بعض الخطوط، بس كان فيه مشكلة للخطوط التانية والشركات الصغيرة. لو بعتوا الحاجات بالشحن الجوي ، ممكن  تفريغها و تخليصها ياخد أيام على  بعض الطرق. إرسال الطرود زي الأمتعة للفحص كان الطريق الوحيد عشان تستلمها سريع، ولكن لا تسمح القوانين الداخلية لشركات الطيران أنها ترسل أمتعة بلا راكب، عشان كده بييجي دورك في المرحلة دي.
mt: Shipping companies are willing to pay good money to get things there quickly.  In the normal course of business, time is of the essence for documents, goods, and parts that need to be delivered urgently.  Larger companies own their own aircraft, but on some routes, smaller airlines and companies have a problem.  If you buy goods by air, it can take days to unload and clear them on some routes.  Sending packages as luggage for inspection was the only way to get them quickly, but internal regulations do not allow airlines to send luggage without passengers, so this is where you come in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: لازم تختار شركة الخطوط الجوية المنتظمة الخاصة بعناية. رغم أنك ممكن تشوف أنه شيء طبيعي أنك تنضم لشركة الطيران التي بتسافر بيها كتير، لكنك لازم تعرف أن الامتيازات اللي بتتقدم ليك في الغالب بتكون مختلفة وأن النقاط بتاع المسافر الدائم بتكون سخية أكتر لما بتقارن الأمر مع شركة طيارات تانية في التحالف نفسه.
mt: Choose a regular airline with care. Although it may seem natural to join an airline that you fly with often, you should know that the perks you are offered are usually different and that frequent flyer points are more generous when compared to another airline in the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: اشرب المشروبات الكحولية باعتدال. لأن الكحول بيأثر على الناس بأشكال مختلفة، ومهم أوي أنك تعرف حدودك. الأحداث الصحية الطويلة اللي ممكن تحصل وبتيجي بسبب شربك لكحوليات كتير  بتسبب الضرر للكبد بل وحتى العمى والموت. والخطر المحتمل بيزيد لما تستهلك الكحول المنتج بطريقة غير قانونية. المشروبات الكحولية غير القانونية ممكن يبقي فيها ملوثات خطيرة متعددة زي الميثانول، اللي ممكن يسبب العمى أو الموت حتى لو تناولته بجرعات قليلة.
mt: Drink alcohol in moderation. Alcohol affects people in different ways, and it's important to know your limits. Long-term health problems that can result from excessive drinking can cause liver damage, blindness, and even death. The potential risks increase when you consume alcohol produced illegally. Illicit alcohol can contain dangerous contaminants such as methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: حي القنال (بالهولندية: Grachtengordel) منطقة مشهورة بترجع للقرن السبعتاشر بتحاوط وسط مدينة أمستردام. المنطقة كلها اتصنفت عشان تكون موقع للتراث العالمي لليونسكو عشان قيمتها الثقافية والتاريخية اللي ملهاش مثيل، وقيم ممتلكاتها اللي بين أعلى القيم في البلاد.
mt: The Grachtengordel (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a well-known area dating back to the 17th century in the centre of Amsterdam. The entire area was designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its cultural and historical value, and the value of its properties, which are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: فنوم كروم ومكانه على بعد 12 كيلومتر من مدينة سيام ريب، وهو معبد اتبنى على قمة التل في نهاية القرن التاسع خلال فترة حكم الملك ياسوفرمان. الأجواء المعتمة المتاحة حول المعبد وكمان إنه بيطل على بحيرة تونلي ساب بيخلي التسلق على المرتفعات شيء مثير للاهتمام. ممكن بسهولة تزور الموقع وتاخد رحلة بالمركب للبحيرة. تصريح أنغكور مطلوب عشان دخول المعبد عشان كده متنساش أنك تجيب جواز سفرك معاك لما تروح تونلي ساب.
mt: Phnom Kulen and its location 12 km from Siem Reap, is a temple built on top of a hill at the end of the 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The dark atmosphere available around the temple and also that it overlooks Tonle Sap Lake makes climbing the heights an exciting thing. The site can easily be visited and take a boat trip to the lake. Angkor pass is required for entry to the temple so remember to bring your passport with you when you go to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: القارة القطبية الجنوبية هي أبرد مكان على الأرض، وبتحيط بالقطب الجنوبي. الزيارات السياحية مكلفة ، وعايزة لياقة البدنية ، وما ينفعش تتعمل غير فى الصيف من نوفمبر لفبراير ، ومحصورة فى شبه الجزيرة والجزر وبحر روس. يعيش ألفين موظف هنا في الصيف في 48 قاعدة تقريبا معظمهم في المناطق دي، وفيه عدد قليل بيخليه للشتاء. القارة القطبية الجنوبية الداخلية هضبة مقفرة بتغطيها من 2 إلى 3 كيلومترات من الجليد. الجولات الجوية المتخصصة بتروح من وقت للتاني لجوه، عشان تتسلق الجبال أو الوصول للقطب اللي فيه قاعدة كبيرة.
mt: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.  Tourism is expensive, and requires physical fitness, and is only possible in the summer from November to February, and is limited to the peninsula, islands, and Ross Sea.  Two thousand workers live here in the summer in 48 bases, most of them in these areas, and a few leave for the winter.  Antarctica's interior is a barren plateau covered by 2 to 3 kilometers of ice.  Specialized flights go from time to time to view, to climb mountains, or to reach the South Pole, which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: القارة القطبية الجنوبية هي أبرد مكان على الأرض، وبتحيط بالقطب الجنوبي. الزيارات السياحية مكلفة ، وعايزة لياقة البدنية ، وما ينفعش تتعمل غير فى الصيف من نوفمبر لفبراير ، ومحصورة فى شبه الجزيرة والجزر وبحر روس. يعيش ألفين موظف هنا في الصيف في 48 قاعدة تقريبا معظمهم في المناطق دي، وفيه عدد قليل بيخليه للشتاء. القارة القطبية الجنوبية الداخلية هضبة مقفرة بتغطيها من 2 إلى 3 كيلومترات من الجليد. الجولات الجوية المتخصصة بتروح من وقت للتاني لجوه، عشان تتسلق الجبال أو الوصول للقطب اللي فيه قاعدة كبيرة.
mt: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.  Tourism is expensive, and requires physical fitness, and is only possible in the summer from November to February, and is limited to the peninsula, islands, and Ross Sea.  Two thousand workers live here in the summer in 48 bases, most of them in these areas, and a few leave for the winter.  Antarctica's interior is a barren plateau covered by 2 to 3 kilometers of ice.  Specialized flights go from time to time to view, to climb mountains, or to reach the South Pole, which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: المراصد إللي سبقت الفترة الحديثة في العادي بتكون غير صالحة للاستعمال النهاردة، وتبقى متاحف أو مواقع تعليمية. لأن تلوث الضوء في ذروتة ما كانش زي طبيعة المشكلة مثل ما هية النهاردة ، هم عادة بكون موقعم في مدن أو في حرم ، أسهل الوصل له من دول المبنيين في الأوقات الحديثة . تلسكوبات البحوث الحديثة أغلبيتها بتكون منشآت هائلة في المناطق البعيدة اللي ظروفها الجوية بتكون مناسبة.
mt: Pre-twentieth-century observatories were usually not usable for the current era, and remained museums or educational sites. Because light pollution was not as severe as it is today, they were usually located in cities or campuses, easier to access than modern-built facilities. Modern research telescopes are usually huge installations in remote areas with suitable weather conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: بسبب أن أوكلاند بتقع بين مرفأين، فيه كتير من الشواطئ، المشهورة بيقع في تلات مناطق. شواطئ نورث شور (في منطقة نورث هاربور) موجودة على المحيط الهادئ وتمتد من لونج باي في الشمال إلى ديفونبورت في الجنوب. كل الشواطئ رملية بتسمح بسباحة آمنة تقريبًا، وأغلبها بتظلها أشجار البوتوكوا. شواطئ طرق تاماكي موجودة على مرفأ ويتيماتا، في ضواحي خليج ميشن وسانت هيليرز في وسط أوكلاند. الشواطئ العائلية دي مزدحمة في بعض الأوقات مع مجموعة جيدة من المتاجر التي بتكون صف على الشاطئ. السباحة آمنة.
mt: Because Auckland is situated between two harbours, there are many beaches, famous in three areas. North Shore beaches (in the North Harbour area) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. Most of these beaches are sandy, allowing safe swimming almost all the time, and most of them are lined with pohutukawa trees. West Auckland beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the suburbs of West Harbour, Whenuapai, and Henderson. These beaches are popular at times with a good range of shops lining the beach. Swimming is safe. East Auckland beaches are on the Manukau Harbour, in the suburbs of Howick, Pakuranga, and Botany. These beaches are popular at times with a good range of shops lining the beach. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: من فضلك متنساش أنك في الأساس في موقع مقبرة جماعية، دا كمان موقع له معنى ملوش نهاية بالنسبة لجزء كبير من سكان الدنيا. لسه فيه كتير من الرجال والنساء موجودين على قيد الحياة من اللي نجوا من وقتهم هنا، وكتير من الأشخاص التانيين اللي كان عندهم أحباء اتقتلوا أو عملوا لحد ما ماتوا هناك، من اليهود وغير اليهود بالتساوي. يا ريت نتعامل مع الموقع بكل اللي يستحقه من كرامة ووقار واحترام. متقولوش نكت عن الهولوكوست أو النازيين. متشوهش الموقع عن طريق أنك تحط علامات أو تكتب جمل فيها كلمات عيب على البيوت.
mt: Please remember that you are essentially in a mass grave, this place also has meaning for a large part of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many other people who had loved ones who were killed or died here, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with the respect and dignity and honor it deserves. Don't make jokes about the Holocaust or the Nazis. Don't deface the site by putting up signs or writing sentences with offensive words on the houses.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: اللغات المساعدة دي لغات مصطنعة أو مبنية سبب وجودها هو تسهيل الاتصال بين الشعوب اللي كان عندها صعوبات في عملية التواصل. وهي بتتفصل عن لغات التواصل المشترك، وكمان لغات طبيعية مكتسبة أصبحت منتشرة وسايدة باعتبارها وسيلة للتواصل بين المتحدثين بلغات تانية.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or engineered languages whose existence is due to facilitating communication between peoples who have difficulties in the process of communication. They are distinguished from common languages, and natural languages that have become widespread and widespread as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: لو كنت بتعبر منطقة بحر البلطيق الشمالية في الشتاء، فلازم تتحقق من موقع الكابينة، لأن المرور عن طريق الجليد بيسبب ضوضاء عالية اوي للأشخاص اللي بيتضرروا كتير. رحلات سانت بطرسبرج البحرية بيبقى فيها قضاء وقت معين في المدينة. وركاب الرحلات البحرية بيتعفوا من متطلبات الحصول على تأشيرة الدخول (بص على الشروط مرة تانية).
mt: If you are traveling to the northern Baltic Sea in the winter, be sure to check the cabin location, as driving on the ice can cause high noise to people who are severely affected. St. Petersburg cruises will include a certain amount of time in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check the terms again).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: مدينة برشلونة بتعتمد لغتين رسميتين هما الكتالونية والإسبانية. وحوالي نصف الناس بيحبوا يتكلموا بالكتالونية ودي يفهمها أغلبية الناس، ويعرف الكل تقريبًا الإسبانية. رغم كده لكن معظم الإشارات بيعبروا عنها باللغة الكاتالونية عشان هي بحكم القانون اللغة الأساسية للإقليم. وبالرغم من ذلك، استعمال اللغة الإسبانية منتشر في المواصلات العامة ومرافق تانية. الإعلانات المنتظمة في المترو بتتذاع باللغة الكاتالونية بس، لكن بيتم إذاعة الاضطرابات غير المتوقعة باستعمال نظام آلي في مجموعة متنوعة من اللغات تشمل الإسبانية والإنجليزية والفرنسية والعربية واليابانية.
mt: Barcelona has two official languages, Catalan and Spanish. About half the people speak Catalan and most people understand it, and most people know Spanish. Most signs are in Catalan, as Catalan is the official language of the region by law. However, Spanish is widely used in public transportation and other facilities. Regular announcements in the metro are in Catalan, but unexpected announcements are made in a variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: في البلاد المتقدمة النهارده، اترفع مستوى توفير المبيت والفطار الفاخر لشكل فني. في الأخر واضح أن الإقامة  والفطار بيتنافسوا أساسًا على حاجتين: النوم والفطار. وعلى كل ده هتلاقي أن المؤسّسات دي فيها أغطية فخمة بتحتاجها الأسرة وممكن برده ألحفة مصنوعة يدويًا أو سرير الطراز بتاعه قديم شوية. الفطار ممكن يبقى فيه الأكل الموسمي بتاع المنطقة أو الطبق الخاص للمضيف. المكان ممكن يكون عبارة عن مبنى تاريخي قديم فيه أثاث عتيق وأراض مشذبة وحمام سباحة.
mt: In developed countries today, the level of providing luxurious breakfast and accommodation has become an art form. In the end, it is clear that these institutions have luxurious covers that the family needs and may also be handmade or an old-fashioned bed of its kind. Breakfast may be seasonal food from the region or a special dish for the host. The place may be an old historic building with antique furniture, manicured grounds, and a swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: مدينة بكين في الصين هتستضيف الألعاب الأولمبية الشتوية سنة 2022، ودا هيخليها أول مدينة تستضيف كل من الألعاب الأولمبية الصيفية والشتوية. هتستضيف بكين حفل الافتتاح والختام والنشاطات الداخلية بتاعت التلج. وكمان هتتنظم مسابقات تزحلق على الثلج تانية في منطقة تايزيتشنغ للتزحلق في تشانغجياكو ودي بتبعد حوالي 220 كيلومتر (140 ميل) من بكين.
mt: Beijing, China, will host the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor events at the snow sports venue. The skiing events will be held in the Zhangjiakou and Chongli ski areas, about 220 kilometres (140 mi) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: مدينة بكين في الصين هتستضيف الألعاب الأولمبية الشتوية سنة 2022، ودا هيخليها أول مدينة تستضيف كل من الألعاب الأولمبية الصيفية والشتوية. هتستضيف بكين حفل الافتتاح والختام والنشاطات الداخلية بتاعت التلج. وكمان هتتنظم مسابقات تزحلق على الثلج تانية في منطقة تايزيتشنغ للتزحلق في تشانغجياكو ودي بتبعد حوالي 220 كيلومتر (140 ميل) من بكين.

src: إنفلونزا الطيور ، أوبشكل رسمى أكتر فيروس إنفلونزا الطيور ، ممكن يصيب الطيور والثدييات. سبق وبلغوا عن أقل من ألف حالة، بس بعض الحالات دي كان خطير. معظمها ارتبط بناس شغالة في تربية الدواجن، ولكن مراقبو الطيور برده معرضون للخطر.
mt: Avian influenza, officially known as the H5N1 virus, can infect birds and mammals. Fewer than 1,000 cases have been reported, but some of these were serious. Most were associated with people working in poultry farming, but bird watchers are also at risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: إنفلونزا الطيور ، أوبشكل رسمى أكتر فيروس إنفلونزا الطيور ، ممكن يصيب الطيور والثدييات. سبق وبلغوا عن أقل من ألف حالة، بس بعض الحالات دي كان خطير. معظمها ارتبط بناس شغالة في تربية الدواجن، ولكن مراقبو الطيور برده معرضون للخطر.
mt: Avian influenza, officially known as the H5N1 virus, can infect birds and mammals. Fewer than 1,000 cases have been reported, but some of these were serious. Most were associated with people working in poultry farming, but bird watchers are also at risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: الفايكنج استعملوا الممرات المائية الروسية عشان يوصلوا البحر الأسود وبحر قزوين. وممكن يتم استعمال أجزاء من المسارات دي. اتأكد من المتطلبات المحتملة عشان تقدر تاخد تصاريح خاصةٍ، واللي ممكن صعب تاخدها. تصل قناة البحر الأبيض - بحر البلطيق المحيط المتجمد الشمالي ببحر البلطيق، وبيمر ببحيرتي أونيجا ولادوجا ومدينة سانت بطرسبرغ، وده في الغالب من خلال أنهار وبحيرات. بحيرة أونجا متصلة بردو بفولجا، عشان كده الوصول من بحر قزوين عن طريق روسيا لسه متاح.
mt: The Vikings used the Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some parts of these routes may still be used. Make sure you meet the requirements to obtain special permits, which may be difficult to obtain. The Baltic Sea - White Sea - Arctic Ocean - Baltic Sea route passes through the White Sea, Ladoga and Onega Lakes, and Saint Petersburg. Onega Lake is connected to the Volga, so access from the Caspian Sea via Russia is still possible.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: علطول بتكون نقطة تفتيش الهجرة هي أول منطقة أول ما تنزل من طيارة أو سفينة أو مركبة تانية. في بعض القطارات اللي بتعدي الحدود، بيحصل تفتيش على القطار المتحرك ولازم يكون معانا هوية شخصية صالحة عشان نقدر نصعد واحد من القطارات. في قطارات النوم الليلية، ممكن جوازات السفر تتجمع عن طريق المحصل عشان نومك ميتقطعش.
mt: The first point of entry for a plane, ship, or vehicle is usually a border checkpoint. In some trains that cross borders, there is a check on the moving train and a valid personal identity document is required to get off the train. In overnight sleeper trains, passports can be collected by the conductor so your sleep is not interrupted.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "في العموم دولة سنغافورة بتعتبر مكان آمن جدًا، وممكن تتنقل فيه بسهولة، بحيث ممكن تشتري أي حاجة بعد ما توصل. لكن بسبب موقعها اللي هو ""قريب من المناطق الاستوائية"" بدرجات بسيطة بس شمال الخط الاستوائي، فأنتم محتاجين تتعاملوا مع حاجتين: الحرارة العالية المستمرة والشمس اللافحة (ودا نادر أما تكون السماء صافية)."
mt: "In general, Singapore is a very safe place, and you can move around easily, and you can buy anything after you arrive. But because of its location, which is "near the equatorial regions" by a few degrees north of the equator, you need to deal with two things: the high continuous heat and the intense sun (and that is rare unless the sky is clear)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: المعجنات الألمانية كويسة أوي وفي بافاريا بتكون ليها فوايد كتيرة ومتنوعة، زي معجنات جارتها اللي في الجنوب في النمسا. كيكة الفاكهة معروفة، التفاح بيطبخ في الكيك طول السنة، وبيظهر الكريز والبرقوق في الصيف. كتير من المخبوزات الألمانية بتتكون من اللوز والبندق، وأنواع مكسرات تانية. غالباً بياكلوا الكيك الشعبي مع فنجان قهوة قوية. لو أنت عاوز بعض المعجنات الصغيرة والغنية، جرب اللي اسمها ببيرلينر أو بفانكوكن أو كرابفن على حسب المنطقة.
mt: German pastries are delicious and have many and varied uses in Bavaria, such as the pastries of its southern neighbor Austria. Apple cake is well known, apples are baked into the cake all year round, and cherries and plums appear in the summer. Many German cakes are made with almonds and hazelnuts, and other nuts. Pastries are often eaten with a strong cup of coffee. If you want some small and rich pastries, try the Berliner, the Pfannkuchen, or the Krapfen, depending on the region.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: لو عاوز تشوف الدنيا بسيطة، سواء كان ده ضروري أو أسلوب حياة أو تحدي، ففيه كذا طريقة عشان تعمل ده. بيتقسموا أصلاً على حاجتين: إما تشتغل وأنت مسافر أو تحاول تقلل مصاريفك. المقالة دي بتركز على الجانب الثاني. بالنسبة للناس اللى مستعدة تضحي بالراحة والوقت والقدرة على التوقع لتخفيض المصاريف قرب الصفر، إرجع لـ السفر بأقل ميزانية. النصيحة بتفترض أن المسافرين مش بيسرقوا، ومش بيتعدوا، أو مش بيشاركوا في السوق غير القانونية، ولا يشحذون، أو يستغلون الآخرين عشان منفعتهم الخاصة.
mt: If you want to see the world on a budget, whether that's necessary or a lifestyle or a challenge, there are many ways to do that. They split into two: either you work while you travel or you try to reduce your expenses. This article focuses on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time, and the ability to plan to reduce expenses to zero, travel on a shoestring. The advice assumes travelers are not stealing, not breaking the law, not engaging in the black market, not cheating, or exploiting others for their own benefit.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: الامتداد بين بوينت ماريون و فيرمونتبيبقى فيه أصعب ظروف القيادة على طريق بافلو-بيتسبرغ السريع، عشان بيمر بشكل منتظم عن طريق تضاريس غابات معزولة. لو مش متعود على السواقة على الطرق الريفية، لازم تكون حذر، لأنه فيه دايمًا منحدرات وممرات ضيقة ومنحنيات مطرفة قوي. حدود السرعة المعلنة أقل بشكل ممكن يتلاحظ من اللي كانت عليه في الأقسام السابقة واللاحقة — عادة 35-40 ميل في الساعة (56-64 كم / ساعة) — والالتزام الأساسي بيهم أكتر أهمية من غير الأمر ده. لكن خدمة التليفون المحمول أقوى بكثير هنا من الخدمة في حتت تانية من الطريق، زي براري بنسلفانيا.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Vermont is the most challenging driving on the Pittsburgh-Buffalo highway, as it passes through a regular series of isolated forested ridges. If you're not used to rural roads, be careful, as there are always steep slopes, narrow passes, and sharp curves. The posted speed limit is lower than can be observed in the previous and subsequent sections — usually 35-40 miles per hour (56-64 km/h) — and compliance is more important than in other sections. However, mobile phone service is much stronger here than in the second half of the road, as in Pennsylvania forests.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: رياضة الأودية هي إنك بتروح لقاع وادي إما يكون فاضي أو مليان بالمياه. رياضة الأودية بتجمع بين السباحة والتسلق والقفز، بس بتحتاج تدريب ولو قليل نسبيًا وحالة جسمانية كويسة (لو قارناها مثلاً بتسلق الصخور أو الغوص تحت الميه أو التزلج على جبال الألب).
mt: Whitewater sports are when you go down a river either empty or full of water. Whitewater sports combine swimming, climbing and jumping, but you need training and at least a decent physical condition (if we compare it to rock climbing or scuba diving or skiing in the Alps).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "لما تركب عربيتك وتمشي بيها في رحلة طويلة دا بيكون ليه جاذبية ذاتية موجودة في بساطته. على عكس المركبات الكبيرة، ممكن تعرف تقود عربيتك وكمان تعرف حدودها. أنك تعمل خيمة في ملكية خاصة أو في مدينة بأي حجم ممكن تلفت انتباه مش مرغوب فيه بسهولة. باختصار، عربيتك وسيلة حلوة عشان تقوم برحلة برية، ولكن نادر ما تكون في حد ذاتها وسيلة ""عشان التخييم"". ممكن تخيم في العربية لو كان عندك ميني فان كبير ، أو عربية دفع رباعي ، أو سيدان ، أو عربة ستيشن بكراسى ممكن تتطبق."
mt: "When you climb into your car and take a long drive, there is a certain amount of self-induced gravity present in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you can know how to drive your car and you can know its limits. You can camp in your car in private property or in a city of any size without easily attracting unwanted attention. In short, your car is a nice way to go on a road trip, but rarely is it itself a "camping vehicle." You can camp in a car if you have a large minivan, a four-wheel drive, a sedan, or a station wagon that can be converted."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: اتأسست مدينة الدار البيضاء الجديدة على ايدين صيادين السمك البربر في القرن العاشر قبل الميلاد، واستعملها الفينيقيين والرومان والمرينيد كمينا استراتيجية اسمها أنفا. البرتغاليين دمروها وبنوها تانى باسم كازا برانكا، و بعدين هجروها بعد زلزال في ١٧٥٥. السلطان المغربي بنى المدينة من جديد باسم دارو لبادية، والتجار الأسبان اللي أسسوا قواعد تجارية هناك سموها الدار البيضاء. الدار البيضاء مش من الأماكن الجذابة من ناحية التسوق في كل المغرب. ممكن أي حد يلاقي بسهولة أماكن لبيع السلع المغربية التقليدية في كل حتة في المدينة، زي الطواجن والفخار والحاجات المصنوعة من الجلد والشيشة وكل الحاجات الرخيصة، ولكن كل ده للسياح بس.
mt: Founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC, the Phoenicians, Romans and Merinids used it as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, and then abandoned it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan Sultan rebuilt the city as Daru Lbaida, and the Spanish traders who established their commercial bases there called it Casablanca. Casablanca is not one of the most attractive shopping places in Morocco. Anyone can easily find places to sell traditional Moroccan goods in every corner of the city, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, glassware and all cheap things, but all of this is for tourists only.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: اتأسست مدينة الدار البيضاء الجديدة على ايدين صيادين السمك البربر في القرن العاشر قبل الميلاد، واستعملها الفينيقيين والرومان والمرينيد كمينا استراتيجية اسمها أنفا. البرتغاليين دمروها وبنوها تانى باسم كازا برانكا، و بعدين هجروها بعد زلزال في ١٧٥٥. السلطان المغربي بنى المدينة من جديد باسم دارو لبادية، والتجار الأسبان اللي أسسوا قواعد تجارية هناك سموها الدار البيضاء. الدار البيضاء مش من الأماكن الجذابة من ناحية التسوق في كل المغرب. ممكن أي حد يلاقي بسهولة أماكن لبيع السلع المغربية التقليدية في كل حتة في المدينة، زي الطواجن والفخار والحاجات المصنوعة من الجلد والشيشة وكل الحاجات الرخيصة، ولكن كل ده للسياح بس.
mt: Founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC, the Phoenicians, Romans and Merinids used it as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, and then abandoned it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan Sultan rebuilt the city as Daru Lbaida, and the Spanish traders who established their commercial bases there called it Casablanca. Casablanca is not one of the most attractive shopping places in Morocco. Anyone can easily find places to sell traditional Moroccan goods in every corner of the city, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, glassware and all cheap things, but all of this is for tourists only.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: مدينة سنترا الرومانتيكية ذات الجمال الكبير موجودة ناحية الشمال في مكان سهل الوصول ليها، وهي المدينة اللي اشتهرت وسط الأجانب بعد سرد اللورد بايرن المبهر لروائعها. أتوبيس سكوترب 403 بيسافر بانتظام إلى سينترا، وكمان بيوقف في كابو دا روكا. في الشمال برده فيه الحرم العظيم لسيدة فاطيما (الضريح) ، وهو مكان للظهورات المريمية المشهورة عالميًا.
mt: The romantic city of Sintra, with its great beauty, is located in the north, easily accessible, and is the city that became famous among foreigners after Lord Byron's stunning description of its wonders. The 403 Scutuber bus travels regularly to Sintra, and also stops at Cape da Roca. In the north, there is the great shrine of Our Lady of Fatima (the tomb), a place of well-known Marian apparitions worldwide.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: أعلنت منطقة ناجورنو - كاراباخ الأرمنية العرقية في أذربيجان سنة 1994 الحرب على الأذريين. جمهورية جديدة اتأسست  بدعم من أرمينيا ، لكن و لا بلد معترفة بيها رسمي ، حتى أرمينيا نفسها. الخلافات الدبلوماسية في المنطقة مازالت بتأثرعلى العلاقات بين أرمينيا وأذربيجان.
mt: The Armenian ethnic enclave of Nagorno-Karabakh declared war on Azerbaijan in 1994. A new republic was established with the support of Armenia, but no country officially recognizes it, not even Armenia itself. Diplomatic tensions in the region continue to affect relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: واحدة من نقاط قوة شارلوت في كارولاينا الشمالية إن عندها خيارات كتير جودتها عالية للعائلات. اللي عايشين في مناطق تانية غالبًا بيبقى عندهم سبب زي الود الأسري كسبب أساسي عشان ينتقلوا لهناك، وفي الغالب بيجد الزوار سهولة إنهم يتمتعوا بالمديتة ومعاهم الاطفال. فى الـعشرين سنة اللي فاتت، زادت كمية الإختيارات المناسبة للأطفال في أبتاون شارلوت زيادة كبيرة . العائلات مش بتستعمل سيارات الأجرة في العموم في شارلوت، رغم أنها ممكن تكون ليها فايدة ما في بعض الظروف. فيه فلوس رسم إضافية في حالة وجود أكتر من مسافرين، عشان كده ممكن يكون الخيار ده أغلى من اللازم.
mt: One of Charlotte, North Carolina's strengths is that it has many high-quality family-friendly options. Families living in other areas often have a reason to move there, and visitors will find it easy to enjoy the city with children. In the past twenty years, the number of child-friendly options in uptown Charlotte has increased significantly. Families do not generally use taxis in Charlotte, although they may be useful in some circumstances. There is an additional fee for more than one passenger, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: قبل ما يوصل الأسبان في القرن الستاشر، كان الإنكا بيحكموا شمال تشيلي، بس سكان أروكانيا الأصليين (مابوتشي) كانوا بيسكنوا وسط وجنوب تشيلي. كانت المابوتشي بردو واحدة من آخر مجموعات السكان الأصليين الأمريكية المستقلة، واللي مكانتش مقبولة بالكامل في الحكم الناطق بالإسبانية حتى بعد ما استقلت تشيلي. رغم إعلان تشيلي استقلالها سنة 1810 (وسط الحروب النابليونية اللي سابت إسبانيا من غير حكومة مركزية عاملة لكذا سنة)، لكن الانتصار الحاسم على الأسبان متحققش لغاية سنة 1818.
mt: Before the Spaniards arrived in the 16th century, the Incas ruled northern Chile, but the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) lived in the center and south of Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent indigenous American groups, not fully accepted into the Spanish-speaking government until after Chile declared independence in 1810 (during the Napoleonic Wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for five years). The decisive victory over the Spaniards was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: تشينكوي تيري معناها خمسة أراضي وهي خمس قرى ساحلية صغيرة وهي ريوماغيوري ومانارولا وكورنيغليا وفيرنازا ومونتيروسو موجودة في منطقة ليغوريا الإيطالية. وهي موجودة في قائمة اليونسكو الخاصة بالتراث العالمي. في كل العصور الناس بنوا الشرفات بعناية فوق الأماكن الطبيعية الصعبة شديدة الانحدار عشان تصل بينها وبين المنحدرات اللي بتطل على البحر. جزء من جمالها بيتلخص في قلة مستوى تطوير المؤسسات الظاهر وكمان الطرق والقطارات والمراكب بتربط القرى مع بعضها والعربات مش هتعرف تدخلها من الخارج.
mt: 5 Terre (Five Lands) is a group of five small coastal villages: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza, and Monterosso, located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Throughout the centuries, people have built the characteristic terraces with great care on the steep and difficult natural terrain in order to connect them with the slopes overlooking the sea. Part of their charm lies in the low level of visible development of the institutions, as well as the roads, railways, and boats that link the villages to each other and the outside world.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: السبب المنتشر أكتر ورا الحوادث في الشتاء هو الطرق الزلقة والأرصفة (الأرضيات المرصوفة) والسلالم الخاصة. أنت محتاج جزم بنعال مناسبة ودا حد أدنى. الجزم الصيفي بتكون في العادي بتزحلق جدًا على الجليد والتلج، حتى إن شوية جزم شتوية تكون مش مناسبة. التصميم لازم يكون عميق بما فيه الكفاية، بعمق 5 مم (1/5 بوصة) أو أكتر، وتكون المادة لينة بما فيه الكفاية في درجات الحرارة الباردة. بعض الأحذية بيبقى فيها مسامير وفيه عناصر تانية مرصعة لمواجهة الظروف المناخية الزلقة ومناسبة لأغلب الأحذية للكعب أو الكعب والنعل. لازم يكون كعب الحذاء مستواه أقل وعريض لأنه بيكون فيه رمله أو زلط أو حصى أو ملح (كلوريد الكالسيوم) على الطرق والممرات عشان قوة الجر تكون أسهل.
mt: The most common cause of winter slips and falls is icy sidewalks and walkways. You need good winter boots, and a minimum tread depth. Winter boots are often slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are not suitable. The tread depth should be at least 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have nails and other elements to face the weather conditions and suitable for most boots for the heel or heel and sole. The boot heel should be lower and wider because there will be gravel or snow or rocks or salt (calcium chloride) on the roads and paths so that the force of the pull is easier.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: "جزر كوك دي دولة جزرية بترتبط ارتباط حر بنيوزيلندا، وموجودة في بولينيزيا في وسط جنوب المحيط الهادئ. دا أرخبيل فيه 15 جزيرة منتشرة على مساحة تزيد عن 2.2 مليون كيلومتر مربع من المحيط. مع نفس المنطقة الزمنية زي هاواي، في بعض الأوقات بيتبص إلى الجزر علي أنها ""هاواي أسفل"". مع إنها صغيرة في الحجم، بس هي بتفكر بعض الزائرين القدامى القادمين بهاواي قبل تأسيس الدولة قبل ما تبقى موجودة كل الفنادق السياحية الكبيرة وغيرها من التطويرات. جزر كوك مفيهاش أي مدن بس فيها خمستاشر جزيرة أهمها راروتونجا وإيتوتاكي."
mt: "Cook Islands is a group of islands in the South Pacific Ocean in free association with New Zealand. It comprises 15 islands whose total land area is 224.6 km² (86.7 sq mi). In 1900, it was annexed by the United Kingdom and in 1965, the right of representation was granted to the people of the islands. In 1967, the Cook Islands became a self-governing state in free association with New Zealand. It has been fully independent since December 1994. In 1980, New Zealand and the Cook Islands signed a treaty establishing the Independent State of the Cook Islands as a self-governing domain within the Commonwealth. The Cook Islands have become a member of many international agencies, including the United Nations in 1996, the Commonwealth of Nations in 1997, and the Pacific Community (SPC) in 1999. The Cook Islands have no military forces. The Cook Islands Police Service is responsible for internal security and is supported by New Zealand's Royal New Zealand Navy. New Zealand is responsible for external security. The Cook Islands is a member of the Pacific Islands Forum and the Pacific Islands Development Program. The Cook Islands is a member of the Pacific Community (SPC). The Cook Islands is a member of the International Criminal Court."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

In 1967, the Cook Islands became a self-governing state in free association with New Zealand. It has been fully independent since December 1994. In 1980, New Zealand and the Cook Islands signed a treaty establishing the Independent State of the Cook Islands as a self-governing domain within the Commonwealth. The Cook Islands have become a member of many international agencies, including the United Nations in 1996, the Commonwealth of Nations in 1997, and the Pacific Community (SPC) in 1999. The Cook Islands have no military forces. The Cook Islands Police Service is responsible for internal security and is supported by New Zealand's Royal New Zealand Navy. New Zealand is responsible for external security. The Cook Islands is a member of the Pacific Islands Forum and the Pacific Islands Development Program. The Cook Islands is a member of the Pacific Community (SPC). The Cook Islands is a member of the International Criminal Court."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: لازم تحجز التصاريح من البداية. ولازم تاخد تصريح عشان تقضي الليل في سيرينا. سيرينا هي محطة  الحراسة الوحيدة اللي بتوفر أماكن للبيات ووجبات سخنة ده غير التخييم. لا ليونا، سان بيدريللو ولوس باتوس ما بتقدمش غير التخييم من غيرخدمة الأكل. ممكن تاخد تصاريح المنتزه علطول من محطة رانجر في بويترو خمينز، بس مش بيقبلوا بطاقات الائتمان. خدمة المنتزه (ميناي) مبتديش تصاريح دخول المنتزه قبل أكثر من شهر من ميعاد الوصول المتوقع. كافيه CafeNet El Sol (كافيه نت إل سول) بيقدم ميزة إنك تحجز مقابل رسم قيمته 30 دولار أمريكي أو 10 دولارات أمريكية ودا عشان تذاكر ليوم واحد بس؛ وهتلاقي التفاصيل كلها موجودة على صفحة كوركوفادو.
mt: You must reserve in advance. You must reserve to spend the night in Serenac. Serenac is the only ranger station that offers camping and hot meals, in addition to camping. No Leonia, San Pedro del Lago and Los Patos offer only camping without service. You can get park passes from the Ranger Station in Pueblito de Chiminze, but they don't accept credit cards. Park service (Mina) does not accept park entrance passes more than a month before the expected arrival date. CafeNet El Sol (CafeNet El Sol) offers a feature that you can reserve for a fee of $30 or $10; and you will find all the details on the Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: تعريف التزحلق على التلج بشنطة على الضهر: النشاط ده كمان اسمه التزحلق على التلج في الحتت الفاضية أو رحلات التزحلق أو المشي لمسافات طويلة على التلج. دا بيرتبط بجولات التزلج على جبال الألب أو تسلق الجبال، ولكنه مش بيبقى في العادي من ضمنه جولات التزلج على الجليد أو تسلق الجبال، لأنهم بيحتاجوا تضاريس منحدرة أويس وعاوزين زلاجات صلبة وأحذية طويلة. فكر في مسار التزلج على الجليد على انه مسار شبه المشي لمسافات طويلة. في الأحوال الكويسة، هتقدر تقطع مسافات أطول من المشي، لكن نادر ما هتوصل لسرعات تزلج المسافات الطويلة بلا حقيبة ظهر ثقيلة وفي مسارات مجهّزة.

ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: صدمة العودة إلى الوطن الأم بتحصل أسرع من الصدمة الثقافية (تقصر مرحلة شهر العسل)، وبستتمر مدة طويلة ويمكن حدتها تكون أكتر. المسافرين اللي كان سهل عليهم يتأقلموامع الثقافة الجديدة أحياناً بيواجهوا صعوبة بشكل خاص عشان يتأقلموا من جديد مع ثقافتهم الأصلية. لما ترجع للوطن بعد ما تعيش بره، هتكون تكيفت مع الثقافة الجديدة وفقدت بعض عاداتك من ثقافة وطنك. لما سافرت بره في البداية، كان الناس ممكن صبورين ومتفهمين، مع العلم أن المسافرين في بلد جديد لازم يتأقلموا على الوضع. الناس ممكن ميتوقعوش أن الصبر والتفاهم ضروريين بردو عشان المسافرين اللي راجعين لبلادهم.
mt: The shock of returning home can happen faster than the culture shock (short honeymoon period), and a long period of adjustment can be expected. Travelers who easily adapted to the new culture may have difficulty readjusting to their original culture. When you return home after living abroad, you will have adapted to the new culture and lost some of your original culture's habits. When you first traveled abroad, people may have been patient and understanding, knowing that travelers in a new country must adapt to the situation. People may not expect patience and understanding to be necessary even when travelers return to their home country.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: حيوانات الموظ (اللي اسمها بردو الإلكة) مش عدوانية طبعها، بس هتدافع عن نفسها لو حست بخطر. لما الناس ميشوفوش أن حيوان الموظ خطر محتمل، ممكن يقربوا كتير ويعرضوا نفسهم للخطر.
mt: The porcupine (also called the echidna) is not inherently aggressive, but will defend itself if it feels threatened. When people do not realize that the porcupine is a potential threat, they may approach it closely and expose themselves to danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: بسبب حرارة النهار، المسافرين ممكن يشوفوا السراب اللي بيوهمهم أن فيه ميه (أو أشياء أخرى). ممكن تكون دي خطيرة لو اللي مسافر ورا السراب، وأهدر الطاقة الثمينة والمياه الباقية. صحاري كتيرة جدًا ممكن يكون فيها حرارة عالية ممكن تكون برد أوي بالليل. ونزول حرارة الجسم بيبقى خطر حقيقي لو مش لابس لبس يدفي.
mt: Because of the heat, travelers may see mirages that appear to be water (or other things). This can be dangerous if the traveler follows the mirage, wasting precious energy and water. Many deserts are very hot during the day and very cold at night. A drop in body temperature can be a real danger if not dressed appropriately.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: جمهورية الدومينيكان (بالأسبانية: ريبوبليكا الدومينيكان) هي البلد الكاريبي اللي موجودة في النصف الشرقي من جزيرة هيسبانيولا، اللي بتشترك مع هايتي. البلاد بتتميز بإن فيها شواطئ رمال بيضاء وكمان مناظر طبيعية جبلية وكمان مكان لأقدم مدينة أوروبية في أمريكا الشمالية والجنوبية، وهي دلوقتي جزء من سانتو دومينغو. أول حد سكن فى الجزيرة دى هما التاينوس وكاريبس ؛ الكاريبس كانوا بيتكلموا الأراواكانى و دول جم هنا حوالي ١٠،٠٠٠ قبل الميلاد. الغزاة الأسبان خفضوا تعداد سكان التاينو بصورة كبيرة في شوية سنين قصيرة بعد ما وصل المستكشفين الأوروبيين حسب اللى قاله فراي بارتولومي دي لاس كاساس (معاهدة جزر الهند)، الغزاة الإسبان  قتلوا  حوالى ١٠٠،٠٠٠ تاينوس ما بين سنة ١٤٩٢ و ١٤٩٨.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. The country has a mixed geography of mountains, valleys, seacoasts, and rivers. The country's capital and largest city is Santo Domingo. The first inhabitants of the island were the Taíno people, who were wiped out by the Spanish colonizers in a short period of time after the arrival of the European settlers, according to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Treatise on the Indies), the Spanish colonizers killed about 100,000 Taíno between 1492 and 1498.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "الرياضات الثلجية على المنحدرات زي التزلج والزحلقة على التلج، هي رياضات شعبية زي الزحلقة على أرض متغطية بالتلج بالزلاجات أو لوح التزلج المربوط برجليك. يعتبر التزلج نشاط رئيسي خلال السفر وفيه كتير متحمسين ليه، واللي اسمهم في بعض الأوقات ""متشردي التزلج"" وبيخططوا عشان يقضوا أجازات كاملة عشان التزلج بس في مكان معين. فكرة التزلج قديمة قوي - لوحات الكهف بتصور المتزلجين بيرجع تاريخها ل  ٥٠٠٠ سنة قبل الميلاد! تاريخ التزلج على المنحدرات بيرجع للقرن السبعتاشر على الأقل، وسنة 1861 افتتح النرويجيين أول نادي تزلج ترفيهي في أستراليا."
mt: "Skiing and sledding are popular sports like sledding on snow-covered land with sleds or snowboards. Skiing is a major activity during travel and there are many enthusiasts for it, who are sometimes called "ski bums" and plan to spend entire vacations skiing in one place. The idea of skiing is very old - cave paintings depicting skiers date back to 5000 BC! The history of skiing down slopes dates back to at least the 18th century, and in 1861 the Norwegians opened the first recreational ski club in Australia."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: جزر شرق إفريقيا موجودة في المحيط الهندي قصاد الساحلِ الشرقي بتاع أفريقيا. جزيرة مدغشقر هي أكبر جزيرة، وبتعتبر قارة مستقلة له اتكلمنا عن الحياةِ البريةِ. معظم الجزر الصغيرة بتكون بلاد مستقلة أو مرتبطة بفرنسا، وبيكون اسمها المنتجعات الشاطئية الفاخرة. حمل العرب الإسلام إلى البلاد، وانتشر على نطاق واسع في جزر القمر ومايوت. كانت بداية النفوذ والاستعمار الأوروبي في القرن الخمستاشر لما نجح المستكشف البرتغالي فاسكو دا غاما طريق كيب اللي بيربط أوروبا بالهند.
mt: The East African islands are located in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest island, and is considered a separate continent when we talk about wildlife. Most of the small islands are independent countries or are associated with France, and their name is the luxurious beach resorts. The Arabs brought Islam to the country, and spread widely in the Comoros and Mayotte. The beginning of European influence and colonization in the 16th century when the Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama succeeded in finding the Cape route linking Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: هناك تقليد عبارة عن أنك تقوم طوال ليلة عيد الفصح لحد ما تنتهي في مكان مكشوف عشان تشوف شروق الشمس. ممكن بالتأكيد أنك تفسر التقليد ده من وجهة نظر لاهوتية مسيحية، بس فيه احتمال أنه يكون طقس ديني لفصل الربيع والخصوبة من قبل زمن المسيحية. كتير من الكنائس التقليدية بتعمل صلاة عشية عيد الفصح في يوم السبت خلال نهاية أسبوع الفصح، وفي الغالب تبدأ التجمعات في الاحتفال ببعث السيد المسيح لما يحل منتصف الليل.
mt: There is a tradition of staying up all night until sunrise on Easter Sunday to see the sun rise. This can certainly be interpreted as a Christian theological explanation, but there is a possibility that it was a pagan religious ritual for the spring and fertility season before Christianity. Many traditional churches hold an Easter Vigil service on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, and the gatherings usually begin the celebration of the Lord's resurrection at midnight.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: الإكوادور بتلزم المواطنيين الكوبيين إنهم يستلموا جواب دعوة قبل دخول البلد من المطارات الدولية أو نقط الدخول الحدودية. الخطاب ده لازم يتصدق عن طريق وزارة الخارجية الإكوادورية، ولازم يلبي المتطلبات المحددة. اتوجدت المتطلبات دي عشان توفير تدفق هجرة منظمٍ بين البلدين. المواطنين الكوبيين اللي معاهم بطاقة الإقامة الأمريكية الدائمة لازم يروحوا مقر قنصلية الإكوادور عشان ياخدوا إعفاء من الشرط ده. جواز سفرك لازم يبقى صالح لمدة ٦ شهور على الأقل بعد  تواريخ سفرك. هتحتاج تذكرة ذهاب وعودة عشان تثبت بيها المدة اللى هتقعدها.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to obtain an invitation letter before entering the country through international airports or border entry points. The letter must be approved by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and must meet the specified requirements. These requirements are intended to provide a regulated flow of migration between the two countries. Cuban citizens with a valid U.S. permanent residence card must go to the Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption from this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after the dates of your travel. You will need a round-trip ticket to prove the duration of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: النظارات الشمسية ممكن يكون سعرها أقل في البلاد الأجنبية، بالذات في البلاد اللي دخلها قليل إللي بتكون فيها تكلفة العمالة بها أقل. فكر إنك تعمل فحص العين في البيت، بالذات لو كان تبع التأمين، وجيب روشتة الكشف معاك عشان تتعان في مكان تاني. إطارات النظارات عالية الجودة ذات العلامات التجارية الموجودة فى المناطق دى ممكن يبقى فيها مشكلتين: جزء منها متقلد، والأصلي المستورد ثمنه أغلى كتير من اللى فى بلدها.
mt: Solar eclipse glasses may be cheaper in foreign countries, especially in countries with low income where labor costs are lower. Consider doing an eye exam at home, especially if it is covered by insurance, and bring a prescription with you to another place. Some of the high-quality branded tires in these areas may have problems: part of it is stuck, and the original imported one is much more expensive than the one in its country.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
