src: لان كتير من قرى البويبلو بتكون بعيدة، فمش هيبقى معاك فرصة كبيرة للحياة الليلية بدون ما تسافر إلى ألباكركي أو سانتا فيه. إلا أن معظم الكازينوهات المذكورة فوق بتقدم مشروبات، وكتير منها بيقدم برنامج ترفيهي   رائع بيحمل اسم علامة تجارية (و بالذات الكازينوهات الكبيرة حولين منطقة ألبوكيرك وسانتا في). خد بالك: البارات الموجودة في البلاد الصغيرة مش علطول بتكون أماكن كويسة للزاير اللي جاي من بره الولاية علشان يرتاح فيها. السبب الأول هو أن شمال نيو مكسيكو بيعانوا من مشاكل صعبة وهي إنهم بيسوقوا عربياتهم وهما شاربين كحوليات، وكمان عدد السائقين المخمورين مرتفعة قريب من حانات المدن الصغيرة.
mt: Because many of the pueblos are remote, there is not much of a nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. Most of the casinos mentioned above serve drinks, and many of the larger casinos in the Albuquerque and Santa Fe areas have great entertainment programs under a brand name (especially the casinos around the Albuquerque and Santa Fe areas). Keep in mind that the bars in the small towns are not necessarily good places for out-of-state visitors to relax. The main reason is that northern New Mexico has a serious problem with drunk drivers and the number of intoxicated drivers is high near the small town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "البيرة الشعبية الأساسية اسمها ""نامبر وان""، فهي مش مشروب مركب، لكن هي مشروب ممتع ومنعش. البيرة المحلية التانية مانتا. النبيذ الفرنسي أنواعه كتير، ولكن النبيذ النيوزيلندي والأسترالي ممكن يكون انتشارهم واسع. مياه الصنبور المحليّة صالحة عشان الشرب، بس سهل إنك تلاقي زجاجات المياه، لو كنت متخوف. بالنسبة للأستراليين، فكرة قهوة ""فلات وايت"" غريبة. والقهوة الصغيرة السودة هي ""الإسبرسو""، والكابتشينو بيبقى فوقه طبقة من الكريمة (ومش الرغوة)، والشاي بيتقدم من غير لبن. الشوكولاتة الساخنة بتتناسب مع المعايير البلجيكية. عصائر الفاكهة ممتازة رغم أنها غالية."
mt: "The basic popular beer is called "Namur Wann", it is not a mixed drink, but it is a pleasant and refreshing drink. The local beer is Manta. French wines are of many types, but New Zealand and Australian wines can be widely distributed. The local tap water is safe to drink, but you can find bottled water if you are concerned. For Australians, the idea of "flat white" coffee is strange. The small black coffee is "espresso", and cappuccino is topped with a layer of cream (not foam), and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate meets Belgian standards. Fruit juices are excellent, although they are expensive."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "كانت الغواراني أهم مجموعة أصلية تسكن المنطقة اللي بنعرفها دلوقتي باسم باراغواي الشرقية، وكانوا بيعيشوا زي الصيادين شبه الرحالة وبيمارسوا بردو زراعةَ الكفاف. منطقة تشاكو كانت موطن لمجموعات تانية من قبائل السكان الأصليين زى جوايكورو وباياجوا، اللى عاشوا على الصيد والحصاد وصيد الأسماك. باراجواي ، اللي كان اسمها قبل كده ""المقاطعة العملاقة للهنود"" ، نشأت في القرن الستاشر بسبب مواجهة الغزاة الإسبان والسكان الأصليين. الإسبان بدأوا الحقبة الاستعماريّة اللي فضلت تلات قرون. من أول ما أتأسس أسونسيون سنة 1537، باراغواي قدرت تحافظ على كتير من طابعها الأصلي وهويته."
mt: "The Guaraní were the most important indigenous group in the region that we now know as eastern Paraguay, and they lived as nomadic hunter-gatherers and also practiced subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other indigenous groups such as the Payaguá and the Guaycuru, who lived by hunting, farming, and fishing. Paraguay, which was formerly known as the "Great Province of the Guaraní," was founded in the 16th century as a result of the Spanish conquest of the indigenous population. The Spanish began the colonial era that lasted for three centuries. From the founding of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay was able to preserve much of its original character and identity."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "سمعة أهل باريس وحشة بسبب الأنانية والوقاحة والتكبر. الطريقة المثالية عشان تتعايش في مدينة باريس التصرف بخلق كويس كشخص ""bien élevé"" (بمعنى حسن التربية)، رغم أن الأمر مش بيخرج في العادي عن أنه يكون صورة نمطية خاطئة. الأجزاء الخارجية الباريسية الفظة هتتبخر بسرعة لو عرضت بعض المجاملات الأساسية."
mt: "The Parisians' reputation is due to their selfishness, rudeness and arrogance. The best way to coexist in Paris is to behave like a "bien élevé" person (meaning well-raised), even though this is not the usual way of being a stereotype. The Parisian's rude exterior will quickly disappear if you show some basic flattery."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: خدمة مترو ريل فيها درجتين في قطارات المسافرين من وحول مدينة كيب تاون: مترو بلس (اسمها بردو الدرجة الأولي) ومترو (اسمها الدرجة الثالثة). درجة متروبلس قي درجة راحتها أكتر وازدحامها أقل بس أغلى مع أنها أرخص من تذاكر المترو العادية في أوروبا. كل قطر فيه عربات متروبلاص ومترو؛ بتكون فيه عربيات الدرجة الأولى دايمًا في الجزء الأحير القريب من مدينة كيب تاون.
mt: Metrorail has two classes of passenger trains: Metrorail Plus (also known as First Class) and Metrorail. Metrorail Plus has more legroom and less crowding, but is more expensive than regular Metrorail tickets in Europe. Each train has Metrorail Plus and Metrorail cars; Metrorail Plus cars are always at the front of the train near Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: خدمة مترو ريل فيها درجتين في قطارات المسافرين من وحول مدينة كيب تاون: مترو بلس (اسمها بردو الدرجة الأولي) ومترو (اسمها الدرجة الثالثة). درجة متروبلس قي درجة راحتها أكتر وازدحامها أقل بس أغلى مع أنها أرخص من تذاكر المترو العادية في أوروبا. كل قطر فيه عربات متروبلاص ومترو؛ بتكون فيه عربيات الدرجة الأولى دايمًا في الجزء الأحير القريب من مدينة كيب تاون.
mt: Metrorail has two classes of passenger trains: Metrorail Plus (also known as First Class) and Metrorail. Metrorail Plus has more legroom and less crowding, but is more expensive than regular Metrorail tickets in Europe. Each train has Metrorail Plus and Metrorail cars; Metrorail Plus cars are always at the front of the train near Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: ممكن المسافرين يقابلوا آفات حيوانية مش عارفينها في مناطقهم الأصلية. المبيدات ممكن تبوظ الأكل أو تسبب تهيج أو تسبب في اسوء حالات ردود فعل حساسية أو تنشر السم أو تنقل العدوى. الأمراض المعدية ذاتها أو الحيوانات الخطيرة اللي ممكن تصيب أو تقتل الناس بالقوة مش بتتوصف في العادي أنها آفات.
mt: Travelers may encounter unfamiliar pests. Pesticides may contaminate food or cause irritation or severe allergic reactions, spread toxins, or transmit disease. The same diseases or dangerous animals that can harm or kill people are not usually described as pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: كل محل فيه زاوية بيكون مليان بمجموعة مش منظمة من كروت المحمول إللي بتكون مدفوعة مقدمًا وإللي ممكن نستعملها في التليفونات العمومية أو في التليفونات العادية. رغم إن معظم البطاقات كويسة لعمل مكالمات لأى مكان، لكن بيتخصص بعضها في تقديم أسعار مكالمات مناسبة لمجموعات معينة من البلاد. الوصول للخدمات دى عن طريق رقم تليفون ببلاش ممكن تتصل بيه مجانًا من معظم التليفونات.
mt: Every store with a corner of a beehive is full of a disorganized group of prepaid mobile phone cards that can be used in public phones or in ordinary phones. Although most of the cards are good for making calls to any place, some are specialized in providing affordable call rates to certain groups of countries. Access to these services is through a toll-free phone number that can be dialed from most phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: الغابات الكثيفة بيبقى فيها منتزه بحيرات بليفيتش الوطني و الأساس بتاعه بيبقى أشجار الزان والتنوب والشوح، واللي بيميزه مزيج من نباتات الألب والبحر الأبيض المتوسط. عندها مجموعة كبيرة ومتنوعة من المجتمعات اللي فيها نباتات كتير بسبب نطاق المناخات المحلية وأنواع التربة المختلفة ومستويات الارتفاع المتفاوتة. المنطقة بردو فيها تشكيلة متنوعة أوي من انواع السلالات بتاعت الحيوانات والطيور. ممكن نلاقي هناك حيوانات من فصايل نادرة زي الدب البني الأوروبي والذئب والنسر والبومة والوشق والقط البري وديك الخلنج، جنب أنواع تانية معروفة كتير.
mt: The dense forests are home to the Plevna National Lakes Park and its basis is conifers such as spruce, pine and fir, which are distinguished by a mixture of alpine and Mediterranean plants. There is a large and diverse group of communities with many plants due to local climate ranges and different soil types and varying altitudes. The area is also home to a diverse range of animal and bird species. We can find there rare species such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, hawk, wild cat and capercaillie, along with other well-known species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "الشركات الإعلامية بتقدم حاجات مش صحيحة عن الغرض من الأمر وبتدعي إن الهدف منها هو ""التخلص من القرصنة"". في الحقيقة، رموز المناطق مبتأثرش أبدا على النسخ غير القانوني؛ هتتشغل نسخة بت-مقابل-بت من القرص بشكل مقبول على أي جهاز عشان هتتشغل النسخة الأصلية. الهدف الحقيقي هي أنك تدي الشركات دي سيطرة أكبر على أسواقهم؛ يدور الأمر كله حول ربح الأموال."
mt: "The media companies are advancing incorrect demands for the purpose of the matter and are claiming that the goal is ""to get rid of piracy"". In fact, region codes have never affected the illegal copies; a P2P copy of a P2P copy will play on any device to play the original copy. The real goal is to give these companies more control over their markets; it's all about making money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: مراقبة الجمارك ممكن تكون مشكلة، بس في الغالب بيكون فحص الهجرة مش موجود أو إجراء شكلي لما توصل وطنك. تأكد إنك عارف اللي هتقدر تجيبه واللي مش هتقدر تجيبه وتعلن عن أي شيء يتجاوز الحدود القانونية.
mt: Customs inspection may be a problem, but in most cases immigration inspection is not present or a formality when you arrive in your country. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring and declare anything that exceeds legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: مراقبة الجمارك ممكن تكون مشكلة، بس في الغالب بيكون فحص الهجرة مش موجود أو إجراء شكلي لما توصل وطنك. تأكد إنك عارف اللي هتقدر تجيبه واللي مش هتقدر تجيبه وتعلن عن أي شيء يتجاوز الحدود القانونية.

ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: وادي كوشامو وده أول مكان بييجي في دماعنا لما نتكلم عن التسلق في تشيلي، ومعروف باسم يوسيمتي في أمريكا الجنوبية، وفيه كتير من الجدران وصخور الجرانيت الكبيرة. القمم فيها مناظر خلابة من فوقها. المتسلّقين من كل حتة فى العالم بيعملوا باستمرار طرق جديدة بين الحيطان الكثير اللي امكانياتها ملهاش أخر.
mt: Wadi Koshamou is the first place we come to when we talk about climbing in Chile, known as Yosemiti in South America, and has many walls and large granite boulders. The peaks have beautiful views from above. Climbers from all over the world are constantly making new routes between the many walls that have no other.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: لو أنت عاوز تسافر حول العالم كله في نصف الكرة الجنوبي، اختياراتك للرحلات والوجهات هتكون محدودة عشان مفيش طرق بتمر عبر المحيطات. أي تحالف لشركات الطيران مش بيشمل المعابر التلاتة على المحيط في نصف الكرة الجنوبي (ومش بيغطي سكاي تيم أي من المعابر). رغم كده، فإن تحالف ستار يغطي كل حاجة باستثناء بس شرق جنوب المحيط الهادئ من سانتياغو دي تشيلي إلى تاهيتي، وهي رحلة تبع مجموعة خطوط لاتام الجوية التابعة لتحالف عالم واحد. الرحلة الجوية مش الخيار الوحيد لو أنت عاوز تعدي جنوب المحيط الهادئ والساحل الغربي لأمريكا الجنوبية، (بص تحت).
mt: If you want to travel around the world in the southern hemisphere, your flight and destination choices will be limited because there are no overwater routes. No airline alliance covers all three southern hemisphere overwater routes (and SkyTeam doesn't cover any of them). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti, which is flown by a LATAM Airlines Group member of the OneWorld alliance. The flight is not your only option if you want to cross the South Pacific and the west coast of South America (below the equator).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: على مستوى العالم فيه حوالي 200 منظمة سياحية عاملة، أغلبيتها بتشتغل باستقلالية. وريثة شركة جلوبال ريننج تورز وهي شركة جو ريننج تورز خلفت عشرات من شبكات مزودي الخدمات إدارة المعالم السياحية في أربع قارات. مع جذور ممتدة لبرشلونة في جولات الجري برشلونة وجولات كوبنهاجن للجري بكوبنهاجن، انضمت لهم بسرعة جولات سباق براج للجري ومقرها في براج وغيرها.
mt: There are about 200 independent tour operators worldwide, most of them operate independently. The successor to Global Running Tours, a global running tour company, has left behind dozens of service provider networks managing tourist attractions in four continents. With roots extending to Barcelona in Barcelona's running tours and Copenhagen's running tours in Copenhagen, they quickly joined Prague's running tours, headquartered in Prague, and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "رحلات السفاري ممكن تكون أكبر عامل جذب سياحي في إفريقيا وأكتر بروز عشان كتير من الزوار. مصطلح رحلات السفاري في الغالب بيستخدم للإشارة للسفر عن طريق البلاد عشان مشاهدة الحياة البرية الروعة في أفريقيا، بالذات في السافانا. بعض الحيوانات، زي الفيلة والزراف، بتميل أنها تقرب بشكل قوي من العربيات والمعدات القياسية بتسمح بالمشاهدة الجيدة. الأسود والفهود والنمور ساعات بتبقى خجولة وممكن تشوفوهم أحسن باستعمال المنظار. رحلات السفاري اللي على رجليك (اسمها بردو ""رحلة للمشي على رجليك"" أو ""التنزه وأنت ماشي على رجليك"" أو ""التمشية"") هي المشي لمسافات طويلة ممكن توصل لساعات أو أيام."
mt: "Safari trips can be the biggest tourist attraction in Africa and the most popular for many visitors. The term safari usually refers to travel through the country to see the wonderful wildlife of Africa, especially in the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and zebras, tend to be close to vehicles and standard equipment that allow good viewing. Lions, leopards, and tigers sometimes be shy and can be seen better with binoculars. Walking safaris (also called "walking trips", "walking and hiking", or "hiking") are long walks that can last hours or days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: لو لوحدك أو مع صديق واحد بس، حاول تقابل أشخاص تانيين وكمان تشكل مجموعة من أربعة إلى ستة أفراد عشان تاخد سعر أفضل للفرد، عشان الجولات السياحية أرخص للمجموعات الأكبر في العدد. ورغم كده، مينفعش أن ده ميكونش ضمن اهتماماتك، لأن في الغالب أماكن السياح بتتغير عشان ملء العربيات. الأمر في الواقع كان شكله أنه طريقة لخداع الناس عشان يظنوا أن عليهم يدفعوا الكتير.
mt: If you're traveling alone or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six people to get a better price per person, as larger groups are cheaper. However, if this is not your interest, as the tourist sites are likely to change to fill the buses. In fact, it was a way to deceive people to think they had to pay a lot.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: اقتصاد مدينة سان فرانسسكو بيعتمد على أنها منطقة جذب سياحي عالمية واقتصادها متنوع. الوظائف بتكون متاحة بشكل كبير في القطاعات المهنية وكمان الحكومة والشؤون المالية والتجارة والسياحة. ظهورها المتكرر اللي في الموسيقى والأفلام والأدب والثقافة الشعبية ساعد أن المدينة ومعالمها تكون معروفة للدنيا كلها. طورت سان فرانسيسكو بنية تحتية سياحية واسعة بتضم كتير من الفنادق والمطاعم وقاعات المؤتمرات على أعلى مستوى. سان فرانسيسكو كمان واحدة من أفضل الأماكن في البلاد عشان مأكولات المطابخ الآسيوية التانية زي: الكورية والتايلاندية والهندية واليابانية.
mt: The economy of San Francisco is heavily service-based, with employment spread among a wide variety of industries. The city has a strong finance industry, and is home to several major banks and Fortune 500 companies. The presence of the University of California, San Francisco, has made the city a center for the development and spread of medical and biological innovations. The city's diverse population, as well as its progressive politics, has made it a center for the development of the gay rights movement and alternative lifestyles. The city is also a center for the development of new technology, including computer software, biotechnology, and social media. The city's unique geography and climate have made it a popular destination for tourists, and the city is home to several major tourist attractions, including the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz Island, and Fisherman's Wharf.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: الحجز من بدري بيدي أمان للمسافر أنه هيكون عنده مكان ينام فيه أول ما يوصل للمكان اللي رايحه. رغم انك ممكن تلاقى أنواع حجز تانية من الإقامة، زى أماكن التخييم عن طريق وكيل سفر، بس غالبا بيتعامل وكلاء السفر مع فنادق معينة. العادة جرت أن وكلاء السفر يقدموا باقات منها الإفطار، وترتيبات التنقل من وإلى المطار أو حتى باقات مجمعة منها الطيران والفنادق. ممكن يحتفظوا بالحجز لك لو محتاج وقت تفكر في العرض أو عشان تحصل على ورق تانى لوجهتك (زي التأشيرة). رغم كده أي تعديلات أو طلبات بتكون عبر وكيل السفر في البداية ومش عن طريق الفندق.
mt: A reservation from the start will guarantee you a place to sleep when you arrive at your destination. Although you may find other types of accommodation, such as camping through a travel agent, most travel agents deal with specific hotels. They usually offer packages including breakfast, and arrangements for transportation to and from the airport or even combined packages of airfare and hotels. They may keep the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or to obtain another paper for your destination (such as a visa). However, any changes or requests will be through the travel agent first and not through the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: تطبيقات مترجم النصوص الفوري هي تطبيقات ممكن تترجم أجزاء كاملة من النص من لغة للتانية بطريقة تلقائية. بعض التطبيقات من الفئة دي ممكن تترجم النصوص الموجودة على إشارات أو حاجات تانية على أرض الواقع واللي مكتوبة بلغات أجنبية لما يوجه المستعمل الهاتف الذكي للأشياء دي. محركات الترجمة اتحسنت بشكل كبير، ودلوقتي في الغالب بتقدم ترجمات صحيحة إلى حد كبير برده (ونادر لما بتقدم كلام ملوش لازمة)، بس لازم تكون منتبه، عشان ممكن تكون ترجماتهم خطأ بشكل كامل. أحد أبرز تطبيقات هذه الفئة تطبيق ترجمة Google، اللي بيسمح ليك إنك تترجم لما يكون الاتصال بالإنترنت مش متوفر بعد ما تنزل بيانات اللغة اللي عايزها.
mt: Instant text translation apps are apps that can automatically translate entire texts from one language to another. Some apps in this category can translate texts on signs or other real-world objects written in foreign languages when you point your smartphone camera at them. Translation engines have improved greatly, and now in most cases they provide translations that are largely correct (and rarely provide nonsense), but you need to be careful, as they can be completely wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is the Google Translate app, which allows you to translate when an Internet connection is not available after downloading the language data you want.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: الانهيارات التلجية مش حاجة غريبة: فالمنحدرات الحادة مابتستحملش غير كمية معينة من الثلج ، والكميات الزيادة بتنهارعلى شكل انهيارات  تلجية. المشكلة أن الثلوج لزجة، عشان كده بتحتاج بعض التحفيز عشان تنزل، وبعض الثلوج النازلة ممكن تكون حافز للباقي. الحدث الأصلي اللي بيسبب الأمر في أوقات كتير بيكون هو تسخين الشمس للتلج، وفي اوقات تانية أن كتير من الجليد بيسقط، وفي أحيان تانية بتكون ظواهر طبيعية تانية وفي الغالب يكون السبب البشر.
mt: Avalanches are not uncommon: steep slopes cannot hold a certain amount of snow, and the excess slides down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some stimulation to slide, and some of the snow that slides can be a stimulus for the rest. The original event that causes the problem at times is solar heating of the snow, at other times it is a lot of snow falling, and at other times it is other natural phenomena, and in most cases it is human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "طبق الكاري بيبقى طبق فيه أعشاب وبهارات ولحمة وخضار. البهار بتاع الكاري ممكن يكون ""جاف"" أو ساعات ""رطب"" على حسب السائل اللي موجود. في المناطق الداخلية من شمال الهند وباكستان، بيستعملوا عادة الزبادي كتير مع الكاري، وفي جنوب الهند وبعض المناطق الساحلية الثانية من شبه القارة،  بيستعملوا عادة حليب جوز الهند."
mt: "Curry is a dish with spices, herbs, meat and vegetables. The curry spice can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the liquid used. In the interior of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is often used with curry, and in southern India and some coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is often used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: معبر القطب الجنوبي (أو الطريق السريع) هو طريق طوله 1600 كم، من قاعدة ماك موردو الموجودة على بحر روس على القطب. دا تلج مضغوط ، فيه شقوق مليانة ومتعلمة بالأعلام. ومتقدرش تعديه غير بجرارات متخصصة، و زلاجات سحب مليانة بنزين و معدات . دول مش رفيعين كفاية، عشان كده المسار لازم ياخد منحنى طويل حوالين جبال القطب الشمالي عشان يوصل فوق لهضبة.
mt: The South Pole Road (or Highway) is a 1600 km long road, from McMurdo Station on Ross Sea on the pole. This is a compressed ice, with many cracks and marked with flags. It is not possible to cross it without specialized vehicles, and gasoline-powered snowmobiles and equipment. Countries are not high enough, so the road has to take a long curve around the North Pole to reach the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: الدخول لجنوب أفريقيا بالعربية طريقة هايلة عشان تستمتع بجمال المنطقة وكمان عشان توصل للأماكن البعيدة عن الطرق السياحية العادية. ممكن القيام بده باستعمال عربية عادية مع التخطيط الدقيق ولكن في نصيحة باستعمال نظام الدفع الرباعي 4x4 بدرجة كبيرة، وممكن الوصول لكتير من المواقع عن طريق نظام الدفع الرباعي اللي متزود بقاعدة عجلات عالية بس. حط في دماغك وأنت بتخطط أنه رغم أن جنوب أفريقيا مستقرة بس مش كل البلاد المجاورة مستقرة. متطلبات التأشيرات وتكاليفها بيختلف على حسب البلد، والمتطلبات دي بردو بتتأثر بالبلد اللي جاية منها. كل بلد لها قوانينها الخاصة اللي ليها علاقة بحاجات الطوارئ اللي لازم تبقي موجودة في العربية.
mt: Entering South Africa in Arabic is a whole different experience to enjoy the beauty of the area and also to reach the remote areas away from the usual tourist routes. It can be done with a normal car with careful planning but in my opinion a 4x4 system is highly recommended, and many places can be reached by a 4x4 system with a high ground clearance. Keep in mind when planning that although South Africa is stable, not all neighboring countries are stable. Visa requirements and costs vary by country, and visa requirements are also affected by the country of origin. Each country has its own laws that are related to emergency items that must be present in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: الدخول لجنوب أفريقيا بالعربية طريقة هايلة عشان تستمتع بجمال المنطقة وكمان عشان توصل للأماكن البعيدة عن الطرق السياحية العادية. ممكن القيام بده باستعمال عربية عادية مع التخطيط الدقيق ولكن في نصيحة باستعمال نظام الدفع الرباعي 4x4 بدرجة كبيرة، وممكن الوصول لكتير من المواقع عن طريق نظام الدفع الرباعي اللي متزود بقاعدة عجلات عالية بس. حط في دماغك وأنت بتخطط أنه رغم أن جنوب أفريقيا مستقرة بس مش كل البلاد المجاورة مستقرة. متطلبات التأشيرات وتكاليفها بيختلف على حسب البلد، والمتطلبات دي بردو بتتأثر بالبلد اللي جاية منها. كل بلد لها قوانينها الخاصة اللي ليها علاقة بحاجات الطوارئ اللي لازم تبقي موجودة في العربية.
mt: Entering South Africa in Arabic is a whole different experience to enjoy the beauty of the area and also to reach the remote areas away from the usual tourist routes. It can be done with a normal car with careful planning but in my opinion a 4x4 system is highly recommended, and many places can be reached by a 4x4 system with a high ground clearance. Keep in mind when planning that although South Africa is stable, not all neighboring countries are stable. Visa requirements and costs vary by country, and visa requirements are also affected by the country of origin. Each country has its own laws that are related to emergency items that must be present in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: الشيل للتانيين، متخليش شنطك بعيد عن عينك، بالذات لما تعدي الحدود الدولية. ممكن تكتشف أنه بيتم استغلالك عشان تنقل المخدرات بدون ما تعرف، ودا بيحطك في متاعب كتيرة. والأمر ده بيشمل الوقوف في الطابور، عشان ممكن نستعمل كلاب شم المخدرات في أي وقت بدون إنذار. بعض البلاد بتقرض عقوبات شديدة حتى لو الجريمة كانت اتعملت لأول مرة؛ ومن العقوبات دي أحكام بالسجن لمدة أكتر من 10 سنين أو الإعدام. الشنط المهملة هدف للسرقة، وكمان ممكن تلفت انتباه السلطات اللي بتخاف من التهديدات بوجود قنابل.
mt: 2nd paragraph: Don't leave your luggage unattended, especially when crossing international borders. You may be used to smuggle drugs without knowing, and that can get you into serious trouble. Some countries impose severe penalties even for first-time offenders; sentences can include more than 10 years in prison or death. Abandoned luggage is a target for theft, and it may also attract the attention of authorities who fear terrorist threats of bombs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: املأ بيتك بقهوة قوية الصبح وشاي البابونج المهدئ بليل. لما تكون في عطلة منزلية، هيكون عندك وقت كافي عشان تدلل نفسك وقضاء بعض الدقائق الإضافية عشان تحضر مشروب مميز. لو أنت عاوز تغامر أكتر، استغل الفرصة عشان تحضر أو تخلط بعض العصائر: ممكن تكتشف مشروب بسيط ممكن تحضره على الفطار لما ترجع لروتينك اليومي. لو بتعيش في مدينة فيها تنوع ثقافي بشأن المشروبات الكحولية، فروح بارات أو حانات في أحياء مش بتروحها باستمرار.
mt: Fill your home with strong coffee in the morning and soothing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a home vacation, you'll have enough time to pamper yourself and spend a few extra minutes to make a special drink. If you want to take more risks, take advantage of the opportunity to make or mix some juices: you can discover a simple drink you can make for breakfast when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with cultural diversity about alcoholic beverages, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods that you don't usually go to.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: قرية هالدارسفيك بتوفر إطلالات على جزيرة إيستروي القريبة وفيها كنيسة فريدة بتصميم تماني الاتجاه. في حوش الكنيسة، فيه تماثيل مصنوعة من الرخام ممتعة من الحمام اللي فوق بعض المقابر. الأمر يستاهل نصف ساعة عشان التجول في القرية اللي بتثير اهتمامنا.
mt: The village of Haladarsfiek offers views of nearby Eastroy Island and its unique church with a four-way design. In the church courtyard, there are interesting sculptures made of marble from the nearby cemetery. It is worth spending half an hour to stroll through the village that attracts our attention.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: رغم أن الزيارات القصيرة لبلدان محددة كسائح أو عشان العمل ممكن متحتجش تأشيرة، لكن الذهاب للبلاد دي كطالب دولي بيحتاج في العموم إقامة أطول من لو رحت كسائح عابر بس. في العموم عشان تقغد في أي بلد أجنبي لفترة طويلة، لازم يكون معاك تأشيرة مقدما. تختلف طلبات تأشيرات الطلبة عموما في خطوات التقديم عن تأشيرات السياحة أو تأشيرات العمل العادية. بالنسبة لمعظم البلدان ، هتحتاج جواب عرض من المؤسسة اللي أنت عاوز تدرس فيها وإثباتًا للموارد المالية اللي هتحتاجها على الأقل للسنة الأولى من دراستك. حاول ترجع  لإدارة الهجرة التابع للمؤسسة والبلد اللى انت عاوز تدرس فيها عشان تعرف تفاصيل معينة.
mt: Although short visits to specific countries as a tourist or for work may not require a visa, going to these countries as an international student usually requires a longer stay. In general, to study in any foreign country for a long period, you need a visa in advance. Student visa applications usually differ from tourist or regular work visas. For most countries, you will need a letter of acceptance from the institution you want to study at and proof of financial resources you will need at least for the first year of your studies. Try to return to the institution's immigration department for the country you want to study in to find out specific details.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: في الصيف بالذات، لازم تاخدوا بالكم من البعوض لو خلاص قررتوا تتسلقوا الجبال في الغابات اللي فيها مطر. حتى لو أنت بتسوق عربيتك في الغابات المطرية شبه الاستوائية، ففتحك للأبواب ولو ثواني قليلة وأنت بفتحتها علشان تدخلها دا بيكون وقت كافي للناموس إنه يدخل معاك.
mt: In particular, in the summer, you need to take a lot of mosquitoes if you decide to climb the mountains in the forests where there is rain. Even if you are shopping in the rainforest, opening the doors for a few seconds and you are opening them to enter is enough time for the mosquitoes to enter with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: سونداربانز بيعتبر أكبر حزام منجروف ساحلي في العالم، ويمتد لمسافة 80 كم (50 ميل) إلى مناطق قبالة سواحل بنجلاديش والهند. سونداربانس اتعلن أنها موقع للتراث العالمي لليونسكو. اسمه جزء الغابة الموجود في الأراضي الهندية بمنتزه سونداربانس الوطني. بس الغابات مش مجرد مستنقعات عشان أشجار المانجروف؛ وموجود فيها آخر الشواهد اللي بتقوم على الأدغال الكثيفة التي غطت نهر الغانج قبل كده في يوم. سونداربانس مساحتها 3850 كيلومتر مربع، ثلثها تقريبا عبارة عن مياه ومستنقعات. من سنة 1966، كانت سونداربانز ملجأ للحياة البرية، وموجود فيها دلوقتي 400 نمر بنڠالي ملكي وحوالي 30 ألف غزال منقط في المنطقة.
mt: Sundarbans, considered the largest mangrove forest in the world, extends over 80 km (50 mi) into areas off the coasts of Bangladesh and India. Sundarbans was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Its name is derived from the Sundari trees found in the Indian portion of the forest, Sundarbans National Park. But the mangroves are not just swamps; there are still remnants of the dense forests that once covered the Ganges River before it. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², with about 3,000 km² being covered by water and swamps. Since 1966, Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary, and there are currently 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: فيه في الدنيا أكتر من 5000 لغة مختلفة، منها أكتر من عشرين لغة بيتكلموها 50 مليون متحدث أو أكتر من كده. في الغالب بتكون الكلمات المكتوبة أسهل في الفهم من الكلمات المنطوقة،بردو. دا بينطبق بشكل خاص على العناوين، واللي في الغالب بيكون نطقها صعب. كتير من البلاد بيتكلم سكانها كلهم اللغة الإنجليزية، وفي بلاد أكتر من كده بكتيرٍ، وممكن تتوقع معرفة محدودة بالذات بين الشباب. تخيل، لو حابب، راجل مانكوني وبوسطني وجامايكي وسيدنيسايدر وكلهم قاعدين حوالين ترابيزة بيكلوا العشا في مطعم في تورونتو. هما بيسلوا بعض بقصص أخدوها من مسقط رأسهم، بتتحكي عن طريق لهجاتهم المميزة ولغتهم المحلية.
mt: There are more than 5000 different languages in the world, of which more than twenty are spoken by over 50 million people each. In general, written words are easier to understand than spoken words, too. This is particularly true of headlines, which are often difficult to pronounce. Many countries are entirely English-speaking, and in many more, limited knowledge of the language is expected among the young. Imagine, if you will, a man from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica, Sydney, and Toronto, all sitting around a table eating dinner in a restaurant in Toronto. They are conversing with each other in their distinctive accents and local dialects.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: الأتوبيسات بتمشي من محطة الأتوبيسات اللي بين المناطق (عن طريق النهر) طول اليوم مع إن معظمها وبالذات اللي رايحة للشرق وجاكار/بومثانج بتمشي بين 06:30 و07:30. الأتوبيسات اللي بتتنقل بين الأحياء بتكون مليانة خالص، والأفضل إنك تشتري التذاكر من بدري قبلها بكذا يوم. معظم المناطق بتخدمها أتوبيسات كوستر ودي يابانية صغيرة وبتبقى مريحة وقوية. عربيات الأجرة المشتركة دي وسيلة سريعة ومريحة عشان تتنقل بيها للأماكن اللي جنبك، زي بارو (Nu 150) وبوناخا (Nu 200).
mt: Buses run from the bus station (via the river) all day with most of them and especially those going east and Jakkarta/Bogor running between 06:30 and 07:30. Buses between the neighbourhoods are very crowded, and it is best to buy tickets in advance for a few days. Most areas are served by Koperasi Angkutan Kali (KAK) and small Japanese buses which are comfortable and strong. Shared taxis are a fast and comfortable way to get around, e.g. to Baru (Nu 150) and Bona (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "منطقة ""تمبوكتو"" بيستعملوها مجاز عن الأراضي الغريبة البعيدة لأنه صعب الوصول ليها. مدينة تمبكتو في وقتنا ده مدينة فقيرة، رغم سمعتها اللي بتخليها منطقة جذب سياحي وكمان فيها مطار. في سنة 1990، اضافت للائحة مواقع التراث العالمي اللي بيهددها الخطر، عشان تهديد رمال الصحراء. واحدة من المحطات الرئيسية لهنري لويس غيتس في مسلسل PBS كانت عن العجائب بتاعة العالم الأفريقي الخاصة. المدينة فيه تناقض كبير بينها وبين بقية مدن الدولة، لأن طابعها عربي أكتر منه أفريقي."
mt: "The region is known as "Timbuktu" because it is a remote and difficult place to reach. Timbuktu is a poor city, despite its reputation as a tourist destination and has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of World Heritage Sites in danger due to the threat of desert sands. One of the main stops for Henry Louis Gates' PBS series was about the wonders of the African continent. The city has a large contrast with the rest of the state, because its Arab character is greater than its African."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: دورة الألعاب الأولمبية للمعاقين هتبقى في الفترة من أربعة وعشرين أغسطس إلى خمسة سبتمبر سنة 2021، وبعض أحداث الدورة هتبقى في مواقع تانية في جهات مختلفة من اليابان. بعد ما استضافت مدينة طوكيو الألعاب الأولمبية سنة 1964، بقيت المدينة الآسيوية الوحيدة إللي استضافت دورة الألعاب الأولمبية الصيفية مرتين. لو حجزت رحلات الطيران والإقامة الخاصة بك لسنة 2020 قبل ميعلنوا  التأجيل، ممكن تواجه موقف محرج. سياسات الإلغاء بتختلف، لكن من آواخر مارس، معظم سياسات الإلغاء بسبب فيروس كورونا مش هتطبق لغاية يوليو 2020، لما يتحدد معاد الألعاب الأولمبية. متوقع أن أغلب  تذاكر الحدث تكلفتها ما بين ٢٥٠٠ ين إلى ١٣٠ ألف ين ،أما تكلفة التذاكر العادية  هتكون حوالي  ٧٠٠٠ ين.
mt: The 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from 24 August to 5 September 2021, with some events in other locations in different parts of Japan. After hosting the 1964 Summer Olympics, Tokyo is the only Asian city to have hosted the Summer Olympic Games twice. If you have booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may be in a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but most coronavirus cancellation policies will not apply until July 2020, when the new Olympic Games date is confirmed. Most event tickets are expected to cost between 25,000 yen and 130,000 yen, while regular tickets will be around 70,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "الإعصار هو هواء على شكل عمود دوار وبيكون ضغطه منخفض بشدة ويشفط الهواء اللي حواليه لجوه ولفوق. بيولدوا رياح شديدة (100-200 ميل/ساعة في أغلب الأحيان) وممكن ترفع الأجسام التقيلة في الهواء، وتحملها وقت ما بيتحرك الإعصار. هي بتبدأ كممرات بتهبط من غيوم العاصفة، وبتبقى ""أعاصير"" لما تلمس الأرض."
mt: "A hurricane is a column of rotating air with low pressure at its center and sucks in air from around it downward and upward. It produces strong winds (100-200 mph most of the time) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as it moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and remain ""hurricanes"" when they touch the ground."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: لو البلد التي هتزورها لازملها مشورة تتعلق بالسفر، ممكن يتأثر التأمين الصحي للسفر أو تأمين إلغاء الرحلة. ممكن برده تطلب استشارة من حكومات تانية غير حكومتك ، لكن نصيحتهم هتفضل مخصصة لمواطنيهم. يعني مثال على كده المواطنين الأمريكيين اللي موجودين في منطقة الشرق الأوسط ممكن يواجهوا مواقف مختلفة خالص عن اللي بيواجهوها الأوربيين أو العرب. فالنصايح ملخص موجز للوضع السياسي في بلد ما. في الغالب بتكون الآراء اللي بتتقدم سريعة وعامة ومبسطة لما نقارنها بالمعلومات المفصلة الكتيرة المتوفرة في أماكن تانية.
mt: If your country is in turmoil, your travel insurance or trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also request advice from other governments, but their advice will be tailored to their citizens. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may face different situations than Europeans or Arabs. The advice is a brief summary of the political situation in a country. In general, the opinions that are quickly and generally advanced are compared to the detailed information available in other places.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: وكالات السفر كانت موجودة من القرن التسعتاشر. وفي العادي بيكيون وكيل السفر خيار جيد لرحلة تتجاوز خبرة المسافر السابقة في الطبيعة، أو الثقافة، أو اللغة أو البلدان اللي دخلها منخفض. رغم أن معظم الوكالات مستعدة لتولي معظم الحجوزات  المنتظمة، إلا ان  كثير من الوكلاء بيتخصصوا في أنواع معينة من الرحلات أوميزانيات محددة أو الوجهات السياحية. ممكن يكون أفضل إنك تستعمل وكيل بقوم بحجز رحلات مشابهة لرحلاتك في أوقات كتير. بص على الرحلات اللي بيقوم الوكيل بترويجه ونشرها، سواء كان ذلك على موقع إلكتروني أو في نافذة متجر.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is often a good choice for a trip that exceeds the traveler's previous experience in nature, or culture, or language, or countries visited. While most agencies are prepared to handle most routine bookings, many agents specialize in certain types of trips or specific niche markets or tourist destinations. It may be best to use an agent who specializes in trips similar to yours. Look at the trips an agent is promoting and selling, whether on a website or in a storefront.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: "فيه حاجات كتير لازم تاخدها في الاعتبار قبل وأثناء سفرك لمكان ما. الآداب والقوانين والطعام والمرور والسكن والمعايير واللغة وما إلى ذلك بتختلف إلى حد ما عن المكان اللي بتعيش فيه، عشان كدا لما تسافر، متتوقعش أن تكون الأمور زي ما هي في ""الوطن"". دي حاجة انت لازم تخليها في البال ، عشان تتفادى خيبة الأمل أو يمكن حتى تتقرف من الطرق المحلية عشان تعمل الحاجات."
mt: "There are many things to consider before and during your trip to a place. Customs, laws, food, traffic, accommodation, standards, and language, among other things, may differ somewhat from where you live, so when you travel, do not expect things to be like they are in the "homeland". This is something you need to keep in mind, in order to avoid disappointment or even get frustrated by local methods to do things."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: لو كنت مسافر لبلد نامي لأول مرة، أو في مكان جديد من العالم، متقللش خالص من الصدمة الثقافية اللي ممكن تحصلك. حداثة تطوير السفر إلى العالم النامي تغلبت على كتير من المسافرين المستقرين والقادرين، بحيث يمكن تضيف كتير من التعديلات الثقافية القليلة بسرعة. بالذات في الأيام الأولى، فكر علطول أنك تصرف كتير على الفنادق اللي طرازها غربي واللي جودتها عالية والأكل والخدمات عشان تقدر تتأقلم بشكل سريع. متنامش على مرتبة أو وسادة مفروشة على الأرض في مناطق ما تعرفش الحيوانات المحلية . لو كنت بتخطط تخيم ، هات سرير أو مرجيحة شبكية لحماية نفسك من الثعابين والعقارب وما شابه.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country for the first time, or to a new part of the world, don't be too shocked by the cultural shock that you may experience. The development of travel to the developing world has overcome many of the settled and capable travelers, so that you can add a few cultural adjustments quickly. Especially in the early days, think about spending a lot on Western-style hotels, high quality, food and services so that you can adapt quickly. Don't sleep on a mattress or a bedroll in areas where you don't know the local wildlife. If you are planning to camp, have a bed or a mosquito net to protect yourself from snakes, scorpions and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: لو كنت مسافر لبلد نامي لأول مرة، أو في مكان جديد من العالم، متقللش خالص من الصدمة الثقافية اللي ممكن تحصلك. حداثة تطوير السفر إلى العالم النامي تغلبت على كتير من المسافرين المستقرين والقادرين، بحيث يمكن تضيف كتير من التعديلات الثقافية القليلة بسرعة. بالذات في الأيام الأولى، فكر علطول أنك تصرف كتير على الفنادق اللي طرازها غربي واللي جودتها عالية والأكل والخدمات عشان تقدر تتأقلم بشكل سريع. متنامش على مرتبة أو وسادة مفروشة على الأرض في مناطق ما تعرفش الحيوانات المحلية . لو كنت بتخطط تخيم ، هات سرير أو مرجيحة شبكية لحماية نفسك من الثعابين والعقارب وما شابه.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country for the first time, or to a new part of the world, don't be too shocked by the cultural shock that you may experience. The development of travel to the developing world has overcome many of the settled and capable travelers, so that you can add a few cultural adjustments quickly. Especially in the early days, think about spending a lot on Western-style hotels, high quality, food and services so that you can adapt quickly. Don't sleep on a mattress or a bedroll in areas where you don't know the local wildlife. If you are planning to camp, have a bed or a mosquito net to protect yourself from snakes, scorpions and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "خد نسخ من بوليصة التأمين بتاعتك وتفاصيل الاتصال اللي بتخص شركة التأمين وخليها معاك. هتحتاج تقدم عنوان البريد الإلكتروني وأرقام التليفون الدولى بتاعة المؤمن عشان تاخذ إستشارة/ تفويضات وتقديم مطالبات الأضرار. احتفظ بنسخة تانية من أمتعتك وعن طريق الإنترنت (أبعت لنفسك بريد إلكتروني بمرفق أو خزنه على ""السحابة""). لو كنت مسافر ومعاك كمبيوتر محمول أو جهاز لوحي، فخزن نسخة في ذاكرته أو قرصه (ممكن  توصلها بدون الإنترنت). بالإضافة لكده، فهو قدم نسخ من السياسة/جهات الاتصال لزمايله وقرايبه وأصدقائه اللي عندهم استعداد يساعدوا."
mt: "Get copies of your insurance policy and contact details for the insurer. You will need to provide your email address and international phone numbers so that you can receive advice/authorizations and file claims. Keep a second copy of your belongings and by email (send yourself an email attachment or store it in the "cloud"). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disk (you can access it without the Internet). In addition, provide copies of the policy/contact details to your colleagues, relatives, and friends who are prepared to help."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: استخدم كتير من تنسيقات الأفلام المختلفة على مدار السنين، ومن بين التنسيقيات دي الفيلم القياسي مقاس 35 مم (36× 24 مم نيجاتيف) كان انتشاره أوسع. ممكن في العادي تجديدها بسهولة لو نفذت، وتعطي دقة مشابهة تقريبا لـكاميرا DSLR حالية. بعض آلات تصوير الأفلام اللي بتكون متوسطة الحجم وبتستعمل تنسيق 6 × 6 سنتيمتر وبطريقة دقيقة 56 × 56 ميلمتر سالب. دا بيدي دقة قدرها أربعة أضعاف دقة 35 مم سالبة (3136 مم2 مقابل 864).
mt: 35 mm (36×24 mm negative) was the most widely used film format over the years, and can be easily duplicated if processed, and gives a similar quality to a current DSLR camera. Some medium format cameras use a 6×6 cm (56×56 mm negative) with exact precision, giving a resolution of four times that of 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 vs. 864 mm2).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: أسهل طريقة عشان تبدأ في مجال كتابات السفر هي أنها تشحن المهارات على موقع إلكتروني معتمد بتاع مدونات سفريّة. بعد ما تاخد على التنسيق والتحرير على الويب، ممكن بعد كده تعمل الموقع بتاعك.
mt: The easiest way to start in the field of travel writing is to transfer skills to an official website of travel blogs. After editing on the web, you can then work on your site.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: عشان بتتعرض علطول للجراثيم المحلية، فاحتمالية انك تعمل مناعة بيها عالية خالص. لكن في حتت تانية في الدنيا هتكون فيها الكائنات الجرثومية جديدة عليك، ففيه احتمال كبير تظهر مشكلة. برده في الجو اللى بيكون دافى اكتر بتنمو البكتيريا بشكل أسرع وبتعيش بره الجسم فترة أطول. و بكده ظهرت الأوبئة في دلهي بيلي ، ولعنة الفرعون ، وانتقام مونتيزوما وكتير من أصحابهم. زي الحال في المشاكل اللي بيواجهها الجهاز التنفسي في المناخ البارد، بتكون المشاكل المعوية في المناخ الحار منتشرة نوعًا، وكمان بتكون في معظم الحالات مزعجة خالص لكن مش خطيرة أوي.
mt: Because you are exposed to local germs for a long time, the likelihood of you developing immunity to them is high. However, there is a chance that you will encounter new microbes, so there is a high likelihood of problems. In addition, bacteria grow faster and live longer outside the body in cold climates. This is why epidemics occurred in Delhi Belly, the Plague, Montezuma's Revenge, and many of their owners. As with respiratory problems in cold climates, gastrointestinal problems are widespread in hot climates, and are usually annoying but not serious.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: أوروبا قارة صغيرة لكن عدد دولها المستقلة كتير. وفي الظروف العادية لما بتسافر وتمر ببلدان كتيرة فده بيعني إنك مضطر تقدم طلبات تأشيرات ومراقبة جوازات السفر كذا مرة. بالرغم من كدا، فإن منطقة شنغن بتعمل إلى حد ما كدولة واحدة في هذا الشأن. طالما  أنك في المنطقة دي ،  تقدرعادةً  تعدى الحدود  من غير ما تمر بنقاط تفتيش جوازات السفر مرة تانية . ويطريقة مشتبهو، لما تبقى معاك تأشيرة شنغن، مش هتحتاج تتقدم بطلب عشان تحصل على تأشيرات الدخول لكل دولة من الدول الأعضاء في شنغن كل واحدة لوحدها، وعشان كده فيه توفير الوقت والمال والأعمال الورقية.
mt: Europe is a small continent but has many independent countries. In normal circumstances, when you travel and cross many countries, this means you are required to apply for visas and check passports multiple times. Despite this, the Schengen Area works to some extent as one country in this regard. As long as you are in the area, you can usually cross borders without passing through passport checkpoints a second time. The method is suspicious, when you are with a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply to obtain entry visas for each country individually, and for this reason there is a saving of time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: مقبرة توت عنخ آمون (KV62). ممكن تكون أشهر مقابر وادي الملوك، مشهد اكتشاف هوارد كارتر سنة 1922 للمقبرة الملكية للملك في حالة شبه كاملة. بالمقارنة بمعظم المقابر الملكية التانية ، مقبرة توت عنخ آمون ماتستهالش الزيارة ، عشان أصغر بكتير وزخارفها قليلة. وكل اللي عاوز يشوف أدلة على الضرر اللي حصل للمومياء في وقت محاولة شيلها من النعش هيخيب أمله لأنه ممكن بس نشوف الرأس والكتفين. الثروات الرائعة الموجودة في المعبد اختفت، لأنها اتنقلت للمتحف المصري بالقاهرة. الزوار اللي وقتهم محدود بيفضلوا يقضوا وقتهم في مكان تاني.
mt: 1. The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). It may be the most famous of the Valley of the Kings, the scene of Howard Carter's discovery of the royal tomb in 1922 in almost complete state. In comparison with the other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is the most visited, because it is smaller and its decoration is less. And all who want to see evidence of damage to the mummy during the attempt to remove it from the sarcophagus will be disappointed, because it is possible to see only the head and shoulders. The treasures of the magnificent found in the temple have disappeared, because they were transferred to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time prefer to spend their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: ممكن تعمل رحلة مشهورة في النهار أو رحلة نهاية أسبوع فيها مراكب الكاياك والمشي والمتاجر والمطاعم وأكتر من كده. المجتمع الأصلي ده موجود في هاو ساوند قريب من مدينة فانكوفر، وممكن الوصول ليه عن طريق التاكسي المائي المحجوز قبل كده اللي بيطلع من جزيرة جرانفيل في وسط مدينة فانكوفر. الناس إللي بتحب تستمتع بالهواء الطلق لازم يمروا بسي تو سكاي. ويسلرغالية (بتبعد 1.5 ساعة بالعربية من فانكوفر)، ولكنها مشهورة عشان دورة الألعاب الأولمبية الشتوية ٢٠١٠. في الشتاء، ممكن تستمتع بأحسن تزحلّق في أمريكا الشماليّة، وفي الصيف جرب تركب عجل جبلي أصلي.
mt: A popular day trip or weekend trip can include kayaking, hiking, shopping, and dining. The original community is located in Howe Sound near Vancouver, and can be reached by a pre-booked water taxi departing from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. Those who enjoy the outdoors must go to Cypress Mountain. Whistler (1.5 hours by car from Vancouver), is famous for hosting the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy the best skiing in North America, and in the summer, try riding a horse.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: شلالات فيكتوريا هي مدينة في الجزء الغربي من زيمبابوي عبر الحدود من ليفينغستون وزامبيا وقريبة من بوتسوانا. المدينة موجودة جنب الشلالات علطول، وهم أكبر المعالم اللي بتجذب فيها، بس الوجهة السياحية دي بتقدم للباحثين عن المغامرة والمتفرجين على المعالم فرص كتير عشان إقامة أطول. في موسم الأمطار (من نوفمبر إلى مارس)، منسوب المياه هيرتفع والشلالات هتبقى دراماتيكية. هومك هتتبل أكيد لو مريت الجسر أو مشيت على طول الطرق الملتوية قريب من شلالات فيكتوريا. من ناحية تاني الأمر ده بيحصل بسبب أن حجم الميه مرتفع جدًا وبيمنع رؤيتك للشلالات الفعلية بسبب الميه الكتيرة!
mt: Victoria Falls is a city in the western part of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and close to Botswana. The city is located near the falls, which are the largest tourist attraction in the country, but the tourist destination offers much more for the adventurous and sightseers alike. During the rainy season (November to March), water levels rise and the falls become dramatic. You will definitely get wet if you walk across the bridge or along the winding paths near Victoria Falls. On the other hand, this happens because the water level is so high that you cannot see the actual falls because of all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: شلالات فيكتوريا هي مدينة في الجزء الغربي من زيمبابوي عبر الحدود من ليفينغستون وزامبيا وقريبة من بوتسوانا. المدينة موجودة جنب الشلالات علطول، وهم أكبر المعالم اللي بتجذب فيها، بس الوجهة السياحية دي بتقدم للباحثين عن المغامرة والمتفرجين على المعالم فرص كتير عشان إقامة أطول. في موسم الأمطار (من نوفمبر إلى مارس)، منسوب المياه هيرتفع والشلالات هتبقى دراماتيكية. هومك هتتبل أكيد لو مريت الجسر أو مشيت على طول الطرق الملتوية قريب من شلالات فيكتوريا. من ناحية تاني الأمر ده بيحصل بسبب أن حجم الميه مرتفع جدًا وبيمنع رؤيتك للشلالات الفعلية بسبب الميه الكتيرة!
mt: Victoria Falls is a city in the western part of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and close to Botswana. The city is located near the falls, which are the largest tourist attraction in the country, but the tourist destination offers much more for the adventurous and sightseers alike. During the rainy season (November to March), water levels rise and the falls become dramatic. You will definitely get wet if you walk across the bridge or along the winding paths near Victoria Falls. On the other hand, this happens because the water level is so high that you cannot see the actual falls because of all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: قواعد التصوير الفوتوغرافي العادي بتنطبق برده على تسجيل الفيديو ، ويمكن بدرجة  أكبرمن كده. لو هتاخد صورة بس لحاجة ممنوعة، فمينفعش حتى إنك تفكر في أنك تسجل فيديو منه. لو بتستعمل  طيارة من غير طيار ، أتاكد أولا من اللي مسموح ليك بتصويره وايه هي التصاريح أو التراخيص الإضافية المطلوبة. بيكون تحليق الطيارات إللي بدون طيار قريب من المطار أو فوق التجمعات فكرة مش كويس خالصة دايمًا، حتى وإن كان دا قانوني في منطقتك.
mt: Normal photography rules apply to video recording as well. If you take a picture, you need a permit, so you can't even think about recording video from it. If you use a drone without a pilot, first make sure what you are allowed to photograph and what additional permits or licenses are required. Flying drones near the airport or over crowds is always a bad idea, even if it is legal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: التسجيل مطلب إضافي عشان عملية التأشيرة، وفي بعض البلاد لازم تسجل حضورك وعنوانك اللي بتقيم فيه عند السلطات. دا ممكن يكون محتاج إنك تملى استمارة عند الشرطة المحلية أو تروح لمكاتب الهجرة. في بلاد كتيراللى عندها قانون زى ده، بتتولى الفنادق المحلية عملية التسجيل (اتأكد من الاستفسارعن ده). في حالات تانية ، المقيمين خارج السكن السياحي هما بس اللى محتاجين يسجلوا. ومع كده ، ده بيخلى القانون أكترغموض ، وعشان كده حاول تستفسر قبلها.
mt: A passport stamp is an additional requirement for visa processing, and in some countries you must register your presence and address at local authorities. This may require you to fill out a form at the local police station or go to immigration offices. In countries with such a law, local hotels are responsible for registration (check this). In other cases, only those residing outside the tourist accommodation are required to register. However, this makes the law more vague, so try to inquire beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: العمل التطوعي أثناء السفر وسيلة كويسة عشان تعمل فارق ولكن الأمر مش بيتعلق بس بالعطاء. أنك تعيش وتتطوع في بلد أجنبي بيكون طريقة رائعة عشان تتعرف على ثقافة مختلفة وناس جديدة وتكتشف نفسك وتتبن جهة معينة وكمان تتعلم مهارات جديدة. ممكن تكون بردو طريقة جيدة عشان تمديد الميزانية عشان تسمح بإقامة أطول في مكان ما عشان كتير من الوظائف التطوعية بتوفر سكن وطعام ويدفع عدد قليل منهم راتب صغير.
mt: Volunteering while traveling is a great way to make a difference, but it's not about giving. You live and volunteer in a foreign country, it's a great way to get to know a different culture, new people, and discover yourself, adopt a cause, and learn new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch your budget to allow for a longer stay somewhere, as many volunteer positions provide housing and food and a few pay a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
